Not a dealbreaker though, given all the other great stuff this little tablet does.2.  The page turning is by swipes only. When you are tucked in a cozy comforter on a cold night, you sometimes wish for right/left buttons – again, a minor annoyance.3. The weight – it’s a tad heavier than the Sony Experia Z Ultra. But honestly, if losing weight means spending $400 extra, I can do without it!4. The included charger is really slow – I spent the extra money for the power charger. Only I didn’t spend $19.99 on Amazon – I got it on eBay (new) from China, for $5.22, free shipping. Still waiting on it, but its guaranteed to arrive in a couple of days.  Works for me!5. I am an Amazon Prime buff – in fact Prime content is the prime reason why I chose the Kindle. It works great – only your ‘watchlist’ shows perhaps a quarter of what you have saved. If there is a way to see the entire watchlist, I haven’t discovered it (yet).6. The carousel is annoying. It pops up unbidden whenever the Kindle’s turned on. I don’t need to display exactly what books and movies I have purchased and would have preferred if there was a way to discreetly tuck them away only to be brought out when I wish.7. Browsing emails on yahoo can sometime be frustrating – scrolling is immensely difficult as the tablet, to me, seems too sensitive – whether I use a stylus or my fingers, it tends to pop open the email instead of allowing me to scroll thru the list.8. Downloading movies is not too cool – takes too long and if the Kindle powers off, there you go. Lost the portion that you had already downloaded and need to restart.That’s the lot of semi-bad news, if you can call it that. To me, it’s all stuff I can live with, nothing major. Here’s the positive stuff:1. It is GREAT to watch a movie or a show on. The picture (we have a high-speed broadband Wi-Fi) is crystal clear; there is NO dithering or wait time as the video caches. It’s like watching your own personal wrap around widescreen. You might think the size would be too small, but when you do watch it, the screen’s placed close enough to your face comfortably and it actually seems like a much larger screen. Like I said, GREAT definition and clarity.2. The sound’s amazing – clear, sharp and realistic. Even without headphones, it’s powerful enough to give true surround effect and loud enough to make my wife complain. With headphones, you don’t disturb anyone and the immersion is complete. BTW I bought JLabs Jbud J5 ear buds with this after doing some R&D; (read my review if you wish – I even bought an extra pair for the wife) and it’s a perfect match right off the top. Tailor made for the Kindle Fire HDX.3. Reading books is easy, except that a couple of left/right/page turning buttons wouldn’t have hurt. The light levels’s just right and if a white page glares at you, voila, make the screen black, the letters white! Bunch of choices in terms of fonts (publisher’s font included) and one can size them up or down as required.4. Browsing – the silk browser is really great. Fast, no nonsense stuff.5. People talk about the ‘offers’ as annoying – I find it extremely entertaining. Not just are the products good (no TV infomercials here) but also the entire ad experience is VERY unobtrusive. Flick it off whenever you wish and go back using the tab.6. Navigating the Kindle is great (except perhaps the carousel feature which I didn’t like). Downloading documents and files, pictures etc is really fast, movies, not so much as explained in ‘Cons’.7. Best part is its portability. The 7” is slightly too big to slip into the back pocket of my jeans and a jacket pocket is required. However if you do sort out the carrying issue, it’s great to have along and works everywhere there’s Wi-Fi.8. I took the Boingo Wi-Fi on the go service and so far haven’t had too much trouble with it. Of course it’s not as fast as it’s touted to be and there is a tendency to hook you to the nearest network instead of the dedicated Boingo network, but hey, whatever works. I am not that finicky. It takes a bit of time to get hooked, but once it does, it’s a strong link and stays hooked unless you move a few blocks.9. The case and paraphernalia. I definitely wouldn’t recommend spending $50-60 on the recommended sleeves and cases. I bought the Fintie faux leather package and for $20 approx, got a nice collection of stylus, sleeve, extra USB cable and some other small stuff. Works even better if you just buy the Fintie case for about $9.99. You definitely need a bigger case to stuff all those bits and pieces though – the charger, USB, stylus, headphones etc. I also bought a screen protector and a TPU Gel soft skin cover to be used in parallel with my Fintie case as added protection. It’s a tighter fit, but works perfectly.All in all, it’s a GREAT purchase and I am loving it. Will be happy to answer any specific questions that anyone has.  I, for one, am a VERY HAPPY customer.

Reviews.Title: Very responsive, great screen
Reviews.Author: Booker
Reviews.Content: This thing is so cheap that I didn't expect it to be as good as it is. The screen resolution is great, the speakers are good, the touchscreen is responsive, and it has a good selection of apps, at least for the type of stuff I do (like email, Facebook, Flipboard, Netflix, HBO). I've already used Mayday, and it works just as advertised--awesome! I don't play games, so I can't say whether it's any good for gaming.I thought about getting the iPad, and I'm really glad I didn't. It would have been a huge waste of money.

Reviews.Title: Better than I expected
Reviews.Author: Michael Slayton
Reviews.Content: It handles well, has great features and the Mayday button is great (especially for tech-dolts such as me).  I searched on line for lots of tablets, went to stores and handled them and I'm glad I got this one.  It's going to work out just great.

Reviews.Title: I really love the new Kindle
Reviews.Author: toothwarriorprincess
Reviews.Content: I just can't believe how much clearer, sharper and brighter than the kindle fire.  Much lighter and smaller.  I just love love love it!!  Really happy I decided to purchase to purchase the HDX this year.

Reviews.Title: Best Gift for myself
Reviews.Author: Grandma Rose
Reviews.Content: I just love it and love playing games and still look things up. I wonder if I should of got a 32 Gb since Iam always on it.

Reviews.Title: Great tablet
Reviews.Author: jeepstang
Reviews.Content: This is a great tablet. However I returned it because I didn't see that much difference from my kindle fire. If this is the first kindle u buy then it is a nice buy.

Reviews.Title: Enjoy
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: Really enjoy the ease of taking it with me wherever I go. Like reading & playing games during breaks at work & this fits in lunch bag perfectly.

Reviews.Title: Much improved
Reviews.Author: jms
Reviews.Content: Lighter and sharper than the iPad mini, it is a much better reader.  It doesn't have the same apps available, but it is very useful.

Reviews.Title: Nice tablet...for inside use..
Reviews.Author: Pat Rini
Reviews.Content: Bright lovely screen and many interesting and some free apps and books..can keep me busy for quite a long time..Dont like reading my Facebook page on this device....and having a hard time getting rid of the one click ordering...I want to enter my password to order in case I lose the Kindle and someone else can ring up a big bill for me..Used the help guy once and it didn't work..may try again.....I bought one for my 10 year old grandson for Xmas and I am sure he is going to love the games and books..

Reviews.Title: I love my new kindle
Reviews.Author: O. Ben Isaac
Reviews.Content: It is such an elegant tablet! I really love it. It's very comfortable and easy to use.I only wish it had a back camera, not only front camera.

Reviews.Title: simply amazing
Reviews.Author: Tracy Dorey
Reviews.Content: I just got mine delivered today around noon and haven't put it down since. Yo everyone who is saying that they aren't getting what they were expecting then they were obviously expecting the impossible or an iPad. This is not an iPad, the is an e-reader/tablet. No the selection of games isn't as dense as on an iPad or android devise but the media selection is phenomenal. I've done everything on this devise from reading books/magazines to playing games and surfing the web to downloading music and videos. The speed of this quad-core processor is unreal, faster than my core i3 laptop. This thing is absolutely wonderful and am completely satisfied with my purchase. I would honestly pay upwards of 300 for a device of this nature. Money well spent and would recommend to anyone looking for an awesome tablet.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 7"
Reviews.Author: Darline Mason
Reviews.Content: An old grandma learning new technology! I am learning to use this product and really am enjoying it. It has been nice to have so many items on one product to use whenever I want. Highly recommend. A++

Reviews.Title: All I ever needed and more
Reviews.Author: Sahar
Reviews.Content: I was considering the mini iPad but since I was just looking for a media device, chose the Kindle Fire.  I got it and immediately was impressed with the display.  WOW!  I brought it into work and a colleague brought her first generation mini iPad.  There was no comparison.  I can't speak for the new Retina mini iPad but I've been told the Kindle Fire HDX still looks better.The top reasons for purchasing the Kindle HDX was to read books, get news, send email, text from Google account (which it does), watch short movies (90 minutes or less by streaming or from my Cloud), and listen to my music (all in Cloud).In addition, I've turned my Kindle Fire HDX into my alarm clock/sleep timer to ocean waves, my event calender, sole source for Skyping, and main internet searching device. (I don't play games)I have a Macbook but since I've bought the Kindle HDX, I really haven't used my Mac much.I did buy the 16GB and that gave me just under 11 GB when I got it.  After downloading the apps I needed and a song, I still have close to 10 GB.  I basically use the Cloud for everything.I really don't have anything to complain about.  It is doing everything I need.

Reviews.Title: I love the new features, it makes my library much more user friendly.
Reviews.Author: Bellesmom "bellesmom"
Reviews.Content: I have not had it for very long but so far I am happy with it.  It is a bit harder to navigate than my KF 1st gen 7" but some of the new features are really nice.  My favorite so far is the way I can tap on the books in my library & it gives me the info on the book as if I picked up a paperback & read the back times 10 , meaning you get all the info pertaining to that particular book.  That is a really great help when you are selecting your new book , especially when it has been a while since you purchased it.

Reviews.Title: Amazon takes gamble but everyone wins!
Reviews.Author: Cdawg & Co.
Reviews.Content: Incredible product. Chose this over other similar tablets based on good reviews, screen resolution, price and reliability of the android operating system. Side by side comparison of this versus previous HD model showed the vast improvement in picture quality and resolution. Price is unbeatable for what device offers. Amazon literally sells these for less than their production costs. They take a loss on each one sold! That's a company and product willing to take a risk for the benefit of the customer and the hope they will use this great device to buy other products.Highly recommended

Reviews.Title: My first kindle and I love it
Reviews.Author: Todd Aldrich
Reviews.Content: I was looking at many different tablet options.  I decided on the kindle fire hdx 7".  I couldn't be more happy with it.  It does exactly what I need it to do.  For the cost compared to other tablets and the quality I believe this is the best choice for a handheld tablet.  The negative reviews I saw about a bluish hue along the edges are extremely dramatized.  While I have noticed the bluish hue around the display it is not very noticeable even when reading against a white background.  Unless I was actually looking for it I didn't even notice it was there.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: james barksdale
Reviews.Content: I really like this product. I would give the product 5 stars if it wasn't for the "Special offers". The special offers are advertisements that are displayed on the Kindle after power up or sleep mode. You either pay not to get the special offers or pay to remove them later. It cost $15 to remove...

Reviews.Title: great tablet, just needs some apps
Reviews.Author: justin
Reviews.Content: Overall the tablet is very functional, aesthetically pleasing, long-lasting in the power department, and provides amazing resolution.  Everything about this tablet is great and for the best price on the market when considering top name tablets.  Two negatives drop this down to a four star.  The ports being at an angle cause problems when using more protective cases.  App selection is dismal.  This is ranked as a top student tablet and I can't get blackboard without using the actual website.  Missing many big name apps and all the hidden gems.  This must change.

Reviews.Title: What's not to love?
Reviews.Author: I. Fagin "Lewyland"
Reviews.Content: Yes, I'm in love with my new kindle fire. A bit of a learning curve cause I'm usually an apple person. But the mayday feature is great.

Reviews.Title: Great item
Reviews.Author: Jennifer Kidwell
Reviews.Content: Gave it as a gift. Was perfect. I was also very pleased that I received this in just 3 days.

Reviews.Title: Very nice product I would buy another on later on.
Reviews.Author: amy
Reviews.Content: I love having this Kendal hd I love how you can talk to a person when you have a problem and they can walk your problem. My husband loves it also I get to use while he is at work and he plays games all night. I love the kindle I like it better than my own computer.

Reviews.Title: Really good help from the service people
Reviews.Author: cherishak
Reviews.Content: This is a great product but it still has its glitches. The first two weeks were great then the download queue started acting up. They fixed it but now my kindle will turn on the talk button every once in awhile and it tells you everything you touch. It is easy to turn off though. I can't tell you enough about the help team they are fast and you have a button to help you walk through any problems that you have. I connected with a tech that could see my screen and he walked me through everything. I would buy this again.

Reviews.Title: kindle fire hdx
Reviews.Author: lexie Sherwood
Reviews.Content: loving the kindle fire hdx, the only reason why i didnt 5 star is theres no way to customize the "wallpaper".

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 7"
Reviews.Author: babygirldmc
Reviews.Content: Loving my new Kindle Fire right now. Loved the 1st generation Fire as well but this one is faster and the screen is clearer due to the HD. I like the fact that I can print to my wireless printer and the keyboard has the letter trace capability. Also I pulled the pics off my phone thru cloud so I could see them on here. The only thing so far that I don't like is that there is no way (or I haven't figured out how) to select multiple emails so I can delete them unlike my other Kindle Fire. Besides that....Awesome!

Reviews.Title: A winner, as they planned...well
Reviews.Author: ROB SMURAWA
Reviews.Content: Fantastic!  Affordable for such advanced technology.  Speed, weight, resolution, battery life all major pluses.  Think Apple needs a new horse to win this race.  My opinion...

Reviews.Title: Best Kindle ever!
Reviews.Author: h. Richard  greatest game ever.v
Reviews.Content: This is the best Kindle yet!  Greta memory, fast connections, and all-around great choice in a tablet.  I'm glad I chose it!  The only drawback is that the "slide" open button occassionally sticks" and I have trouble opening the device  - Other than that, it's still my favorite!

Reviews.Title: great tablet, excellent customer service to help with battery issues
Reviews.Author: L. Meeks
Reviews.Content: Great upgrade to kindle fire.  I had some battery issues with the one I bought so I went to amazon customer service.  They replaced the kindle two times and gave me a return label at no charge for the bad ones.  Great tablet, great customer service!

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Molly Rigg
Reviews.Content: I have had my kindle fire hex 7" for a month now and absolutely love it.  The sound and picture is wonderful.  The special offers are pretty cool that you can get.  My kindle is very easy to use. Overall this is an awesome product.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX Is Much Better Than Kindle Fire, which Was Already Great!
Reviews.Author: bcb
Reviews.Content: Kindle has done it again.  The Kindle Fire HDX is much better than the Kindle Fire and makes me wonder how I ever got along with just the plain old first Kindle, which I loved at the time.

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: Suzanne Pepple "duzy suzy"
Reviews.Content: I have nooks and also the kindle paper white - but this e reader is the best yet!  it does it all and has beautiful picture.  I would highly recommend - You will not be disappointed.

Reviews.Title: Indispensible.  I Take It Everywhere.
Reviews.Author: Linda J Partridge
Reviews.Content: I love it!  It slips into my purse and I have everything I need for whatever the day brings.  In Notes, I have to do lists, reminders, and shopping lists.  In calendar I have appointments, times, places, and reminder function if I need it.  If I have to wait somewhere -- well, I can sit back just continue my book or game.  I know I haven't even begun to explore all the entertainment options and functions yet, either.  The size is perfect -- small and light enough to carry easily, and big enough to enjoy reading and games.  I loved my Kindle Fire, but this is much better.

Reviews.Title: My personal comments
Reviews.Author: Kristine Majka
Reviews.Content: beautiful color display. Has everything  an adult and child could want in the palm of your hand. Love the 24/7 help. Used that and was in awe. Fast response and people as helpful and knowledgeable as can be.

Reviews.Title: Love it !
Reviews.Author: Denise P.St.John
Reviews.Content: I love my new Kindle !Great from the get-goExcellent pic. I'm also happy with the stereo sound. I have Pandora and the music actually sounds good through it and I can even listen to it across the room.Graphics are excellent.I also have to say that I like the Mayday a lot.I've only used it a couple times, but when you've got a question or are stuck, you're gonna love having it.They even helped us with an issue with our first edition Kindle Fire.Gotta love that!

Reviews.Title: NO HDMI out on KFHDX-- AMAZON Prime log in password.
Reviews.Author: Dee
Reviews.Content: I just ordered a Kindle Fire HDX, and it is shipping now.Now I read that this model does not have the HDMI out.I really looked forward to connecting it to my large screen Phillips TV.We do have a PS3 and PS4 so I guess this won't be too much of a problem.Does Amazon have a way to "log in" on your PS3,  withOUTusing your email and Amazon password-the same ones that have your credit card info etc....DeeUP-DATE:You can make a PIN# on your PS3/PS4 -so it can stream Prime video -BUT NO shopping without the PIN.I still wish they had kept the mini HDMI out-Use this link to see a list and register your second screen devices:http://www.amazon.com/help/secondscreen-kindlefire11-30-2013I also added another STAR- I really like the Kindle.Started reading a Kindle book last night, which I loved.We also watched a Prime video stream which looked GREAT.Dee

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: Vicki
Reviews.Content: Super cool tablet, love the reading view on the internet. CONS: not flash compatible or Firefox ready. :( Other than that, lightening fast processor, speakers have a nice sound and touch screen seems resistant to finger prints.

Reviews.Title: don't like the angled charging port
Reviews.Author: C. Wescott
Reviews.Content: Love it so far. My only issues are the angled direction you have to plug in the charger and the on/off switch. I bought this fire because the port failed in my 1st generation fire. Everyone said the fix was more than half the price of the $139 new Fire.  I upgraded to the HDX because I use my Fire a lot. This angled plug seems ackward and I'm worried it will fail quicker than my old one.

Reviews.Title: Does it all..
Reviews.Author: Robert
Reviews.Content: Love it. Does everything we need and super easy to use. If your interested in buying a tablet give it a try

Reviews.Title: won't play all videos
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: I love this kindle except that  I try to play videos that come up and say this plug-in not supported. Whats with that?  My KindleFie first edition plays them.  I thought this would play them also.  But otherwise so far so good..

Reviews.Title: A fantastic little tablet!
Reviews.Author: G or K B
Reviews.Content: A great little tablet!  Screen resolution is wonderful.  All the features gives one almost everything a laptop or desktop does.  There are hundreds if not thousands of free apps to choose from, and the ones you pay for are plentiful as well.  Contrary to what I had read in other reviews, setting mine up to my Wi-fi system was smooth and easy.  However, as with the original Kindle, keeping the tablet in a cover during use could interfere with smooth operation.  Battery life is not real long if you are on a game but if just reading, it is adequate to give you plenty of time between chargings.  A screen protector or use of stylus is recommended unless you want to be cleaning the surface often.  The Mayday button is priceless!  A real person to help you with questions or in my case setting up additional email.  This alone sets this tablet apart from any out there that I have seen.  So glad I got this!

Reviews.Title: Kindle fire HDx
Reviews.Author: Evegue
Reviews.Content: I love this item I love all the apps the size and the weight and it's a very affordable tablet !

Reviews.Title: office elements and printing are a welcome and needed perk.
Reviews.Author: scottkwimer
Reviews.Content: Fast,simple,music sounds amazing. Printing and creating documents and pdf files is a real plus. Smooth operating. Love it. Oh...can read books too!

Reviews.Title: Most satisfying purchase to date. I'm addicted.
Reviews.Author: Ashagail
Reviews.Content: I am amazed at the quality and the functionality of such a small device. I built my computer by hand about a year ago spending almost a grand in parts and my kindle surpasses it in every way. The video is spectacular, sound is so great that it pulsates through the small speakers on the back and the WiFi is much more reliable than my android.

Reviews.Title: Great tablet, might not be the cheapest out there, but worth the price.
Reviews.Author: DMEDelivered
Reviews.Content: So far I really enjoy the tablet.  It's battery life is not as long as I had hoped, but it is still adequate.  The advertisements option is not bad at all, I've actually accepted a few of the offers.  As Christmas rolls around there are a lot of tablets on sale.  That said, I'm still leaning towards the Kindle being worth a bit more as it does seamlessly connect with amazon while also functioning well as an adroid tablet.  Also, Reading kindle docs on here is much better than I expected. The reading mode or screen just makes it pop.  I thought I would have to get a paperwhite if I really wanted a reader, but this more than meets my expectations.  I would definitely look at another or suggest it to a friend who wants a tablet that does exactly what it says it does.  Also, the camera specs don't do it justice.  The pictures are turning out better than you would think based on the spec.  The more I write this, the more I realize it has exceeded my expectations and maybe I should have given it a 5!

Reviews.Title: Except for a "restart" problem - It's great!
Reviews.Author: Leamm
Reviews.Content: For the most part I am totally thrilled with the new Kindle HDX. I love watching videos and reading books. I would give it 5 stars except that I have had it "restart" all on its own while reading. Very odd, no idea why. Not a big deal as it "boots" right back up on its own and I'm right where I was before it shut down. Hope this happens only occassionally, but so far three times since I got it.

Reviews.Title: Love the thing!
Reviews.Author: J. Paisley
Reviews.Content: I ended up buying a second one because my wife and I enjoyed it so much.  I really had to go looking for the "blue screen" edge I have seen complained about and it is absolutely a non-issue for me and completely un-noticed when I am using the device.it is solid technology at a great price.  Use it for reading, photo showing, netflix, pandora, email, games, amazon videos, accessing my sky drive office documents with an app ect.

Reviews.Title: very good product
Reviews.Author: Marco from Brazil
Reviews.Content: very good product I bougt an apple mini retina and altought the apple mini retina works perfectly and smoother than the kindle , I probably prefer the Kindle because the screen is awsome, less expensive and is closer with a pc operation , I can use apps from oputside amazon app store which is very good but limited sometimes.I bought the 64gigs that is much less expensive than Ipad mini and in my opinion a great a value for your money.

Reviews.Title: Glad I waited until I get get this upgrade
Reviews.Author: nopics_please
Reviews.Content: so far I'm very pleased!  I am finding the Amazon community very helpful with their reviews of applications, etc.  I still have a lot to learn though.  Have yet to be able to access the little 24 hour help person but it's easy to find answers online, too.Still haven't found the Oxford dictionary that is supposed to upload, and I don't know what the Personal Note thing is . . . but everyone needs a project.  I can easily see this little tablet becoming as much a part of me as the old Rolodex or Filofax things did back in my younger days.  IT can hold your life while providing some really great entertainment.

Reviews.Title: Loving it.
Reviews.Author: William D. Tipton
Reviews.Content: Loving it.Got the HDX 7"...one for me and one for the wife.Absolutely no complaints. The mayday feature is great for new users like us when we cant figure something out.Seems to work better on the internet thru the wifi than our hardwired PC's do...faster for certain and sometimes I can  get pages that my PC is having trouble with, go figure.The only shortcoming I have seen is no flash player. So some websites with videos cant play the videos. Not a terrible issue but there are a lot of sites that use flash players. Something to keep in mind if youre shopping around for a tablet.Also I guess the HD models could hook up to a TV with a HDMI cable. The HDX apparently only works wireless. Again, not a huge deal but also something to bear in mind if youre in the market.5 stars for what it is. I use it a lot more than I use my desktop now.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire is exactly what I wanted plus
Reviews.Author: jndcarl
Reviews.Content: I bought the Kindle Fire to upgrade from my Kindle Touch.  It was exactly what I wanted with the added benefits of being able to check my email and use it as a personal planner.  And I can go to the Goodreads website, and Pinterest, and, and, and....I wanted to upgrade because with the Kindle Touch I couldn't read a magazine (The Ensign).  Using the LDS Library App I was able to download magazines, manuals, and scriptures.Then I couldn't get a book from the library for the Kindle, only ePub.  I went to the Kindle forum, someone told me about Overdrive (which is what I use for the audio books) and I downloaded the Kindle Fire version and signed up for Adobe and viola, I can now read the book on my Kindle Fire.  It is exactly what I wanted.I've had it for a couple weeks and I've had no problems.

Reviews.Title: great tablet
Reviews.Author: Carlos Perez
Reviews.Content: Really great tablet.  very nice apps, the resolution and sound is great.  Very easy to use and the apps specially for kids are great.

Reviews.Title: Love it.
Reviews.Author: C. Glidden
Reviews.Content: Love it. It does everything I want, Skype with camera, internet, email, movies, games, books and I can fit it in my purse.

Reviews.Title: Fire HDX 7"
Reviews.Author: Albert L. Johnson "windows developer"
Reviews.Content: This is a great tablet.  I had the first generation Fire and lost it which gave me an excuse to buy this one which just barely came out.  The HDX is fast, has a fantastic screen (resolution is tops), sound is wonderful - much deeper than previous models, interface has been tuned to be more effective.  I read several reviews by competent people including CNet and ZDNet which frankly surprised me because the latter is largely an Apple fanboy club.  ZDNet reviewer said this was a best buy.  More than one reviewer recommended you get more than 16GB if you intend to watch HD movies as the 16GB model is not enough memory.  It is a great tool for watching Amazon Prime movies.I highly recommend this tablet...

Reviews.Title: Versatile device
Reviews.Author: Sanskrit72
Reviews.Content: Great device, versatile device for reading, viewing videos with good parental controls. Right weight and battery power to last a couple of books.

Reviews.Title: portability
Reviews.Author: Gale B. Andler
Reviews.Content: A great portable kindle to keep with you for email, ereading,  gaming and surfing the net.  I also love the mayday feature.

Reviews.Title: love it so much for kindle fire hdx from china
Reviews.Author: Alvin
Reviews.Content: what's more,just a perfect! i can't leave it with a secend. enjoy watching movie,playing games,listening to the music,wow get it home body

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX is a class product
Reviews.Author: R. D. Rothrock
Reviews.Content: Excellent product.  Really enjoying it.  Especially love the amount of storage.  I can carry so much music!  Taking my time exploring and transitioning from an iPad.  It is holding its own.

Reviews.Title: Great Value for Money!
Reviews.Author: S. Kljaiic "SK"
Reviews.Content: I love my new tablet, it is neat, light and fast...Considered few tablets: Ipad Mini, Samsung, Nook and Kindle... at the end decided to try the Kindle Fire HDX Wi-Fi with 64 GB, it seemed to be best value for money. Now I am having it for about a week and I am pretty sure I made an excellent decision. It costs way less than Ipad Mini but except for the back facing camera, it has everything else. OS is fast, internet as well, videos are crisp, the tablet is well build. As many have mentioned there is purplish or bluish edge on the screen but this does not bother me that much, it is very light and thin.In short, great little tablet, excellent value for money! It's a keeper!

Reviews.Title: Hands down...Best tablet on the market.
Reviews.Author: Mike_OH
Reviews.Content: Graphics are a huge improvement over the original Kindle Fire and the quad core processor makes it feel incredibly quick to use.  Rear facing camera now makes Skype usage possible which increases usefulness.More compact, lighter, faster and vastly improved screen.  Great job Amazon!!

Reviews.Title: Best tablet!
Reviews.Author: Richara Logan
Reviews.Content: I love my Kindle Fire HDX! I ordered the one without special offers and it works fantastic! The screen is super clear and the device is very fast. The camera is great. There is no need to change brightness or contrast so the picture turns out good. I loved my Kindle Fire 1st generation and was cautious to buy this one and I am so glad I did!! It's a great device and you will definitely not regret buying this product! :)

Reviews.Title: Perfect for media and reading
Reviews.Author: Rabbitinpumpkin "rabbitinpumpkin"
Reviews.Content: I bought the 32gb 7" model and after two weeks I really like the device.  Admittedly I prefer Apple tablets because I feel the interface is more intuitive and sensible.  FireOS is good too but the android guts falls just short of the polished interface I am used to.  But despite this it makes a very good tablet at an excellent price point.First off the pros:High quality glossy screen which does get some finger print smudging but what tablet doesn't?Excellent Dolby speakers.  Much better than any tablet on the market.Media sounds and looks are top rate.Fast, responsive user interface.Decent battery life. Not sure why people are complaint about battery life.  Don't use auto brightness and turn off all the battery hogs.Cons:The 1.3 MP camera quality could've been been better.I recommend this tablet for anyone looking for a high quality media device for on the go.Heck I'll even read a book and play games on it.

Reviews.Title: Dear Jeff Bezos...
Reviews.Author: S. Bommarito
Reviews.Content: Dear Jeff,This evening when arriving home from work, I anxiously opened the packaging on my brand new Kindle Fire HDX 7".  After spending only a few moments, from setup to navigating through various apps (books, web, videos, etc...), I must say that the device is near flawless.  The unboxing and setup process were as effortless as anyone could hope for.  The performance is spectacular and allowed navigating around the various screens with lightening quickness.  The feel in my hands is wonderful, in terms of size, weight, shape, and texture.  Heck, I even tried out the Mayday button and I must confess it is probably the greatest customer service experience I have had in memory and probably ever.Finally, I come to the topic that has been discussed in so many prior reviews.  This display is beautiful, vibrant and precise.  Unfortunately, this perfection is inexcusably blemished by an uneven purple haze around its outer edges.  This haze is almost twice as wide along one length of the device compared to the opposite side and contrasts so much with the otherwise flawless display, that it provides a distraction I cannot live with.I literally fell in love with your "near masterpiece" in just minutes.  So much so that I mentally tried to convince myself that the many fine attributes outweighed this single flaw ("Gee, maybe I'll get used to it?"), but alas I realize that, like so many others, this is something that I cannot bring myself to "settle" with.I am returning your amazing invention with great regret and I hope that your talented team can resolve this unacceptable issue as quickly as possible.  When this happens, I promise I will be one of the very first to give it another try.  Until then, I would rather do without.Sincerely,A longtime (and hopefully valued) Amazon customer

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 7"
Reviews.Author: bmc
Reviews.Content: I bought the Kindle to take on a family trip. We spent most of our Kindle time trying to get it to hold a charge. It continually had to be charged.  This problem persisted with the charger that came with the Kindle and with another that I'd ordered from Amazon.Insult to injury: in order to do the NYT crossword puzzle, one would need the vision of the gods.  AND the font could not be enlarged.I am very disappointed.  Very.BMC

Reviews.Title: Disappointing
Reviews.Author: Susanlb "susanlb"
Reviews.Content: This is a huge disappointment.  There isvvrrVery disappointed in this purchase.  It is lighter than KFHD, but I really, so far, don't see that it was a wise purchase on my part.  My two requests for help showed me that these poor folks have had minimal training and weren't able to help.  The software is very glitchy with apps and magazines/newspapers.  Perhaps because it is new, no one has a clue how to fix things, except if you're willing to get through to Kindle technical support, and they can help by calling you on the phone.  You don't need to publish this, but I'd appreciate your sending my concerns up the line.  So far, I'd really like to return it.

Reviews.Title: fails to connect to wifi
Reviews.Author: Michael Hallock
Reviews.Content: Waiting on getting the third replacement kindle...this is ridiculous!!! Loved our first edition kindle fire but will NEVER buy another one..shame shame on Amazon...we bought 3 HDX Kindles for Christmas and have had more problems that I care to list....ipads here we come....

Reviews.Title: Would not purchase a Kindle HDX again!!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: As a matter of full disclosure, I own a Kindle ereader paperwhite that works well. Next, I purchased a Kindle 7 inch HDX. CONSTANTLY HAS PROBLEMS CONNECTING WITH WIFI. None of the other devices on my network has this issue, therefore it is a problem with this tablet. Would not purchase again.

Reviews.Title: Depending on what you're looking for, this might be the perfect tablet for you.
Reviews.Author: Joshua LeClair
Reviews.Content: I'll start off with this right away so that you don't waste any more time than you need to. Officially you can't get any of the typical Google apps on this and while the Amazon App store is constantly growing, it still lacks some of the selection that the Google Play store has. If the Google apps (Gmail, Earth, Maps, Music, Youtube) are important to you, this is not the tablet for you.If you can get by without those apps (or are okay with using 3rd party email/youtube apps) and you will mainly be using this for content consumption (movies, books, music, web browsing) and happen to love the Amazon ecosystem, this is the tablet for you. Books look absolutely beautiful on the display as well as video content. Videos loading off of Amazon Prime loaded extremely fast and the ability to download videos from the Amazon Prime Video service for consumption offline is an amazing feature.Despite the slightly angled back this is rather easy to hold onto with one hand comfortably thanks to the smaller overall size (when compared to full size tablets) and it's light weight. The power and volume button being placed on the back is an odd design choice but one that you can get used to rather easily. Unfortunately the angled back also means that when the tablet is plugged in, the USB cable sticks out at a slight angle, may not be an issue but it does give me pause as it could lead to issues down the road.

Reviews.Title: wish I would have spent the extra money and got the Ipad mini
Reviews.Author: mary kay riley
Reviews.Content: The picture is good but find it harder to operate than my son's regular Ipad.  I had considered getting an ipad mini but thought this would meet my needs.  Unfortunately not easy to negotiate and too full of Amazon related products.  How can I get rid of Bing?  Seems like constant advertising.

Reviews.Title: Eventually this will be a great tablet!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I've owned a Kindle Fire, Paperwhite, Keyboard, Fire HD and now 2 different HDX's.  The 2 HDX's are the only Kindle products I've ever had to return. This has the potential to be a great tablet once the bugs are worked out.  The bugs consist mainly of dropped wifi connections, the tablet showing a pop up message that you're not connected to a network when the notification icon shows fully connected, and completely "forgetting" wifi networks on a regular (almost daily) basis.  The first one was "buggy" out of the box, and I had to do 2 factory resets before it would even connect to a wifi network and allow me to register.  I tried factory resets numerous times on the first one and finally returned it.  I then purchased another one and it functioned out of the box, but the wifi issues started within 24 hours.  I did a couple of factory resets and the issues persisted along with random restarts.  After researching the issue online, it appears to be common.  I contacted customer service...who are always fantastic simply to ask if they planned a software or hardware "fix" for these issues.  They offered to exchange the tablet.  In my experience, Amazon is always very quick to fix any software issues...but not so much for hardware.  The solution always appears to be to stand behind the hardware and exchange it if justified.  I've had fantastic experiences with their customer service department.  But then again we buy the majority of our groceries, toiletries, household items and gifts from them...so it's obvious we're very loyal customers.  But in this case after having the same issue with 2 units purchased 3 weeks apart, I opted to simply return the HDX and wait for future "fixes" or for my HD to break beyond repair.  My Fire HD still works great, and I don't need to spend $250 on a table with "OK" improvements that is buggy,  I read and watch movies.  The screen on the HDX is bettter than the HD, but the speakers aren't quite as good.  It's certainly lighter and detaches from the cover easier, but the Origami cover isn't true to the original.  The original "origami" cover would allow you to position the Fire in at least 3 positions including a slanted keyboard setting...the new one only does vertical and horizontal.  We use the video out on the Kindle HD a lot while travelling so the kids can watch "safe" shows in hotels rather than risking the exposure to ^%&$ on hotel cable.  The HDX can employ a wireless device, but it has no mini HDMI out like the HD.  While the volume buttons on the HD were poorly positioned, at least you could reach them while holding the unit in it's case.  When using the Origami case with the HDX the buttons are covered.  So the HDX is faster, lighter, smaller, better screen, better UI, worse speakers, worse connectivity and buggy.  The HD is slightly heavier and larger, fantastic screen but not as good as the HDX.  But it's a 7" screen...I'm still trying to figure out why anyone needs that high of resolution on a 7" screen...but people want it on a 4.7" phone so...  The HD has better speakers and connectivity.  For those interested, the HD can also be "rooted" without losing the Kindle UI or access to Prime instant video features.  As of the time of this review, "rooting" HDX has presented issues for those that don't REALLY know what their doing.  Of course I would never recommend doing this either way since it voids the warranty, but at least there are ways to get that other "store" on the HD without losing all the great Amazon features.  I would have liked the 8.9 tablet, but I think it is way too expensive when you can pick up a Nook HD+ for about 1/3 of the price.  It has the "other" lay store and is easily adapted via the SD card slot to access the Amazon app store.  Of course there's a reason it's priced that low...talk about a "fire" sale!  :)

Reviews.Title: Software issues
Reviews.Author: Sarah Nickels
Reviews.Content: Bought 2 Kindle Fire HDX's as Christmas gifts for my 11yr old and 9yr old. One works great but the other had issues from the start. Kept randomly powering off (among other things)! And now it won't turn on even after troubleshooting. Very Frustrating when you've had it for less than 2 weeks. Spoke to an Amazon Customer Care Rep and they said it's a software issue. Said that they'll send out a new one. Overall we liked the Kindle Fire (when it worked) and Amazon did do a good job at resolving my issue promptly with little hassle.

Reviews.Title: Absolutely WONDERFUL
Reviews.Author: Faith J. Hinkey
Reviews.Content: I'm so happy to have this tablet. I have wanted one for quite a while but was unsure which tablet would be the right one for me. After checking them out on the web I saw this one and decided it would be the one to meet my needs and desires. My husband wanted me to have it for a Christmas present. It exceeds my expectations. So glad I chose this tablet!

Reviews.Title: For the Novice in all of us...or the non-technigeeks  :)
Reviews.Author: K. Johanson
Reviews.Content: It's not always about saving money, even though the HDX is very, very competitively priced.  Sure, the Kindle family is geared to take advantage of the Amazon media content, but this tablet can do so much more.If you want to search the internet, hit your favorite web sites, or simply cruise web links or other hits, the HDX performs exceptionally well as long as you have an adequate internet connection.  The HDX is perfect for streaming movies and music whether it's Amazon content, or non-Amazon content such as Pandora, Netfilx, or other Kindle and/or Android aps.  The 7" is perfect for my travel needs--it's light enough to hold in one hand, the battery will easily last one day with very heavy use, and it's easy on the eyes as the screen/display is excellent.If you want portability and your needs are primarily email functions, browsing the internet, streaming media, using aps & playing games the HDX is hard to beat.

Reviews.Title: Kindle's rock, and this one is even better than the last!
Reviews.Author: MM
Reviews.Content: We love our Kindles more than our iPads! The typing is better, the internet is easier to use, and the selection and store is way better. We do use iPads for games, but we might not keep following Apple. It's so much nicer to have an Android platform for multi-tasking apps, etc.

Reviews.Title: Great gift for my mom
Reviews.Author: Jessica
Reviews.Content: This is my first Kindle (so I don't have others to compare it to) but I love it. It is actually a gift for my mom but I had to set it up for her so I actually got to use it for awhile. It is very user friendly and easy to use. I wish you could "jazz" it up a little by changing the background picture or colors on it but you can't. My mom just uses it for games, internet, videos, but hasn't got into any books just yet. Amazon Prime account is a must with this I would think.

Reviews.Title: Runs very fast, great package!
Reviews.Author: Andrew
Reviews.Content: Pretty slick little system. I'm not in love with the design. The back is not flat, part of it sticks out in a weird pattern but this is way faster than even my Kindle Fire. Having some problems with my Wi-Fi staying connected 1 but my wife's works great. Probably isolated issue. I'd say this is an iPad killer for sure.

Reviews.Title: Patient and Gentle
Reviews.Author: Edith C McDaniel
Reviews.Content: Because they were so helpful and patient with explaining things to me.  I am a senior citizen and I felt like they respected that.

Reviews.Title: In Love with HDX
Reviews.Author: J. Allen
Reviews.Content: As everyone in my family reads we started with just the Kindle Paperwhite.  My girls still use theirs to read daily.  Last year I upgraded to the Kindle Fire and fell in love, was very rarely seen without my Fire.  When my husband decided that he wanted a Fire we debated what we were going to do and decided that I would upgrade and he would take my old Fire.  I bought the HDX from Best Buy and so far I am thrilled with it.  I have not noticed the purple/blue light at the edge that some people have mentioned and find the clarity on the screen to be stunning.  I would definitely recommend this to anyone...Buy and enjoy!!!

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 7" is an exceptional device.
Reviews.Author: Christopher J. Cowen
Reviews.Content: This device is amazing and you will be happy you bought it. The Kindle Fire is an amazing device that displays images like as if they were lifelike.  The device features a fast 2.2GHz quad-core processor and 2GB of RAM for fast that run apps, games, and videos smoothly without an issues.  You will love this device and you can get free two day shipping with this offer.  So if you are in the market for a tablet you like this Kindle.  The marketplace from Amazon is great too.  There are thousands of books and games for free available to you.The thing that separates Amazon's Kindle devices is the fact that their customer service is world class. So many companies get this aspect of their businesses wrong but not Amazon. I had a Kindle device that died on me and they replaced it no questions asked. I have also had to call them occasionally and believe it or not I actually talked to a person, no recorded message. Amazon gets it when it come to their customer service.You will not regret getting this device.Thank you for reading my review, if you have any questions feel free to email me, I would be happy to help you with any questions you have.

Reviews.Title: Love My First Tablet
Reviews.Author: Tamara
Reviews.Content: Love it. My first experience with tablet. Owned for less than a month therefore still have not checked out all of the loaded applications, books or movies available on this device, have spent much of my time enjoying card and bingo games. I like being able to sync email and use the internet but still need to learn more about how to navigate typing on the keyboard. My laptop is now gathering dust! Yes I have recommended the Kindle Fire HDX to others.

Reviews.Title: kindle fire hdx 7"
Reviews.Author: Tammy Shaffer
Reviews.Content: Everything I was looking for in a tablet, Blue light is very visible on one side! Occasionally shuts off when I am in the middle of something. Fast, very fast. Great for movies, audio books, music, and apps galore. They didn't joke when they set this baby up for the internet. My computer can only wish!  Have origami case, works well, no issues.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Runner
Reviews.Content: Bought this for the wife as a replacement for her old Kindle. She absolutely loves it. She doesn't need to use her laptop much anymore. It looks great too.

Reviews.Title: Love My First Tablet
Reviews.Author: Tamara
Reviews.Content: Love it. My first experience with tablet. Owned for less than a month therefore still have not checked out all of the loaded applications, books or movies available on this device, have spent much of my time enjoying card and bingo games. I like being able to sync email and use the internet but still need to learn more about how to navigate typing on the keyboard. My laptop is now gathering dust! Yes I have recommended the Kindle Fire HDX to others.
