Reviews.Title: Happy, happy, happy
Reviews.Author: Unknown
Reviews.Content: I love it. I had the original Kindle fire for 2 years and was still satisfied. I got this HD version as a Christmas gift and couldn't be happier. I love to watch movies and tv shows and the HD is really nice. The web browsing is a lot faster than it was on my older Kindle.

Reviews.Title: 2nd Kindle Fire & I love it
Reviews.Author: K. Toutolmin
Reviews.Content: I like that this new HDX version is lighter in weight because I have arthritic fingers. But, the yellow-ish tint to the white book pages when reading takes getting used to. I have an iPhone. My husband got my iPad because it was too big for my sore fingers. I went with the Kindle Fires because they have the resolution, features and price you can't get from smaller iPads. I also am a very happy & dedicated Amazon Prime user, so this is winning combination for me. I absolutely recommend both the Kindle Fire HD & now the KIndle Fire HDX.

Reviews.Title: Longer battery life would be nice
Reviews.Author: Shetaz "Shetaz"
Reviews.Content: Love the clarity, color, size, and user-friendliness of the Kindle Fire HDX 7".  Would prefer to have a battery that lasted longer, as it doesn't seem to hold up to much use if not constantly on a charger.  Even with it plugged in, the battery still runs low pretty quickly.  Will continue to use my original Kindle for reading since I can read for HOURS at a stretch, for days on end, and it still has battery life!  The Fire is great for games, and I love that I can check email with it, too.

Reviews.Title: Everything we expected and more
Reviews.Author: Douglas hartford
Reviews.Content: As senior citizens, this was our first venture into 21st century communications.  We were delighted and somewhat awestruck by the capabilities of this little device.  About the only slightly negative comment we have is about the fact the camera lens and the screen are on the same side of the tablet so using it to take pictures is awkward,  On the other hand, the lens is in the right place for SKYPE and I suspect that was the primary reason fo its designAs a reader - the main reason we bought it - the Kindle works very very well.A wonderful improvement for our family's technology.

Reviews.Title: HDX7
Reviews.Author: M. Lynch
Reviews.Content: I decided to update from my Kindle Fire 7...I think overall I got a great buy and the upgrades are very nice.  I get on faster and the screen with the increase in pixels is a plus when looking at pictures.  I only wish that it had the green light to show you when it was done charging.  Overall I am a very happy customer.  I have not had to use the Mayday button.  Including the 5 volt charger was appreciated but I had the 9 Volt that I bought for $19.99....that was a surprise.

Reviews.Title: awesome
Reviews.Author: thomas kramer
Reviews.Content: completely awesome and way better than the ipad!  great value and tough to beat the options and capabilities of it.

Reviews.Title: good choice for me
Reviews.Author: Brenda L. Lowther "Lowtherbrenda"
Reviews.Content: I loved my first basic. KIndle. And I had no problems at all with it. Now that I have the KIndle fire, it seems pretty antiquated. So, I gave myself the fire HDX for Christmas and could not be happier with it I have arthritis and must admit this is so much easier on my hands. Now I am taking care of my new grand daughterAn needed something to do while I sit and rock. A great purchase and so much fun.

Reviews.Title: Kindle fire hdx 7
Reviews.Author: Gracy Ferreira
Reviews.Content: Love love love it!!!! The speed, color quality and simplicity of it make it very yet friendly! I was going to buy the iPad mini and so pleased with the kindle fire hdx, especially the price & quality of this tablet

Reviews.Title: Wife loves it!
Reviews.Author: Kevin Folk
Reviews.Content: The purchase was smooth and the product is awesome.  I just don't get the same service from other companies - frustrating.

Reviews.Title: Exceeding Expectations!
Reviews.Author: Alan Herndon
Reviews.Content: This Kindle is outstanding. The graphics, easy of use, and my children and wife use it all the time. We are having fun learning what it can do!

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX
Reviews.Author: Sharon
Reviews.Content: Very Happy with my new Kindle. I bought my husband one for Christmas. He is an avid reader and Loved it. I liked his so much I bought one for my self. Still learning my options, but I do enjoy it very much....

Reviews.Title: Awesome tablet!
Reviews.Author: Jeremy
Reviews.Content: A great device with fantastic screen resolution and an accurate touch keyboard. This tablet made me a believer in tablets and I love the ability to carry a e the ability to carry the whole"Dune" series with me without taking up a ton of space.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX is on fire!
Reviews.Author: mark lupori
Reviews.Content: This is a very nice machine. It is all that it claims to be. The screen quality is crisp and vibrant. It is easy to use and the axis to apps and other media is excellent .

Reviews.Title: My Daughter really likes it!
Reviews.Author: Casandra Slade
Reviews.Content: This was on my daughter's Christmas list and she was excited when she got it for Christmas.  Most interesting is that my 12 year son has been sneaking and using the Kindle, hiding it from his sister!  My birthday is coming up and I might put one of these on my list!  Definitely worth the hype.  It came with my Amazon information already loaded on it so we had to clear that up and get my daughter her own Amazon account - thoroughly enjoying it though!

Reviews.Title: Blah special offers.
Reviews.Author: Cassie
Reviews.Content: I wasn't sure what it meant by "special offers". It just meant it comes with ads. And it costs $15 to remove the ads. I would have purchased one without the feature of "special offers"

Reviews.Title: Awesome probuct
Reviews.Author: Sandy Anderson-Addison
Reviews.Content: I purchased the Kindle HDX for my 7yr old son. We purchased the Kindle Fire for my 9 year old a year and 1/2 ago and it's still going strong. No cracks, glitching. The resolution is awesome, and operating use is simple enough for a 7 year olds to figure out. The only complaint I have, is I wished I would have went for more storage .

Reviews.Title: Awesome tablet!
Reviews.Author: Korin Yearty
Reviews.Content: It's an awesome tablet! However, with the lower price we payed (apparently) comes with a new advertisement on the lock screen. Also, if you allow it to completely run out of battery.. You have to push and hold down both the volume buttons AND the power button at the same time. Not bad, just a couple things u should know.

Reviews.Title: Kindle HDX
Reviews.Author: Fernando Sanchez
Reviews.Content: I bought my wife this kindle for Christmas and she loves it a lot. She uses it to read her books and go on Facebook.  Never leaves the house without it.

Reviews.Title: worth it
Reviews.Author: Jeff Pike
Reviews.Content: This was a christmas gift for the wife and has not let it down out of her sight since christmas

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX Review
Reviews.Author: Joseph E Pymm
Reviews.Content: Great product. Bought it for my 2 young boys and they love it. They used to use mom's iPad but now use their Kindles and they are just as good if not better.

Reviews.Title: Made the Right Decision
Reviews.Author: ShalimarTroy
Reviews.Content: I had been toying with the idea of getting a tablet for several years, but price and purpose always weighed heavily on my decision.  Although I heard goodreviews of the iPad the cost was prohibitive although the store was top notched.  Likewise, I heard good reviews about the Nexus but I was concerned with the store.  The Kindle HDX 7 delivers both as promised: inexpensive and also linked to the largest store in the world.I have had it for about a month now and it has been worth every cent I spent on it.  I love toggling it on and instantly watching movies from either NetFlix or from Amazon Prime.  Its fast and pretty.  I did once have a problem with Netflix -- it kept telling me I had no internet when obviously I did.  I reinstalled the app and never had a problem again.Reading books is great.  Clear and crips lettering and easy page turning.  Magazines I find with a mixed bag.  Essentially the composition of digital magazines has a lot to be desired about, but that has nothing to do with the Kindle.  I configured one email to its mail application and it works well, with no real complaints.  Typing on any soft key keyboard is a chore and I am thinking of getting a pen (although most I have seen are outrageously priced for a plastic stick).Not overly impressed with web surfing on this or any tablet.  I certainly dislike the mobile versions of Wikipedia, Facebook, and Twitter.  Some you can convert over to the normal desktop experience, others you can't (pointing at your Twitter!!).  I love to surf the web and just jump from one site to the next -- this is awkward and difficult with the Kindle.I have had no real trouble with the device and I have not tried their special help feature where I talk to someone.  Since I have no experience with it, I can't really give my opinion.For watching videos, reading books, and catching up on email it is simply fantastic.

Reviews.Title: simple enough
Reviews.Author: Don archer
Reviews.Content: It's easy to use. Nice clear display image. And the set up with Amazon to get the Kindle going was a walk in the park.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire
Reviews.Author: R. Bettio "lovetoread"
Reviews.Content: It was a gift for my grandson and he loves it.  He seems to be able to do more with this new one than the one we bought him two years ago.

Reviews.Title: HDX
Reviews.Author: Danielle Wiley
Reviews.Content: Love it and so does my 10 year old and my 12 year old Autistic son. Fits easily in our small hands and took no time to figure the system out. Im still learning.

Reviews.Title: Nice gift idea
Reviews.Author: Army Sgt 8
Reviews.Content: Gift for my wife who travels alot. She loves it and uses it daily for work and for games on long flights. She also plays Scrabble with a friend a thousand miles away, pretty cool way to stay connected.

Reviews.Title: Addictive!!!!!
Reviews.Author: hfrefgtgd this stinks
Reviews.Content: This kindle is awesome. Although I am new to using it, the previous reviews were true. I have no complaints with it whatsoever. I personally would recommend it. I love it!!! I can't seem to put it down.

Reviews.Title: I'm happy with this...
Reviews.Author: LJCB
Reviews.Content: ...I really am. I just wish it was made clearer that, even tho this is an upgrade from the 7" Kindle Fire I previously had, it still DOES NOT allow me to install flash player.  I miss out on a lot of videos posted, esp on Facebook.The "may day" feature is very cool, and it's easier to save photos, not to mention I can now take them! If I could only install flash player, I'd probably give it FIVE stars!

Reviews.Title: Impressive
Reviews.Author: John J. Lachance "Geek Speak"
Reviews.Content: We've had the original Kindle Fire and this product is such an impressive upgrade. Love the screen, the speed increase and of course, all the amazon prime content. Bought it for my wife and she loves it though I borrow it often.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX is Awesome!!
Reviews.Author: Diane Rudnick
Reviews.Content: I love this kindle! Perfect size and the colors are beautiful. Everything comes up quickly. A good friend bought two, showed hdx to me. Boom I bought one!

Reviews.Title: Better than an iPad
Reviews.Author: Salvador Del Toro
Reviews.Content: I like it and it's easy to use. I have to play more with it. I would recommend it over an iPad.

Reviews.Title: Kudo's to Amazon
Reviews.Author: fish2escape
Reviews.Content: I have had a Kindle since they first come out. I have tried the nook and other e-readers.. Amazon rocks on this one!  I started out with the Kindle Fire HD and was so impressed that I ordered the HDX..  Great decision!!  Love this product and just knowing I have the Mayday button for my Kindle for Dummy's questions!! The HDX has the front facing camera and is easy to send your pic's and other doc's from your pc to the kindle. Also can send doc's, screen shots, photo's to my printer. Good quality pics!!  Better battery life than the Kindle Fire..  Enjoy!!

Reviews.Title: This is A Great Deal!
Reviews.Author: David Brune
Reviews.Content: Great price and  just what the doc ordered! As tablets go, this will not break the bank but will get you much more than the basic Kindle reader.

Reviews.Title: Loved it for media. Not enough apps.
Reviews.Author: mary j master
Reviews.Content: This was for a friend.  She loved the size, setup, and, of course, viewing media was awesome.She returned it because the specific apps she wanted were not in the Amazon App Store. If you can't side load or extract .apk files, you may not find all the apps you want or need - at this time. I'm sure the Amazon will enlarge their offerings with time.

Reviews.Title: Amazing, Fast, Beautiful display
Reviews.Author: Arthur Atlas "atlasarch"
Reviews.Content: I am incredibly pleased.  The HDX has far surpassed my expectations and I couldn't be happier and more impressed.  A great product.

Reviews.Title: Christmas Gift
Reviews.Author: Shirley Sierak
Reviews.Content: This was a Christmas gift for our son.  The year before we had given a Kindle to our grandson (his 14 yr son) and the four of our children had gotten together and given me a Kindle for Christmas.  Which I enjoy very much.  This it appeared on our son's list.

Reviews.Title: Nice tablet
Reviews.Author: Tristan
Reviews.Content: I received the HDX 7" with offers from a work Christmas party. So far I enjoy it and have since picked up Amazon Prime to go with it.I do also own HP Touchpad and the Google Nexus 7 (2013)Out of the 3 I use the HDX the most although I don't like the fact that my google account and app purchases don't transfer over. The screen quality is great and I am satisfied with the battery life. The ads don't ever seem to get in the way or bother me. I tend to take this thing everywhere with me.The only thing is I tend to prefer the straight android environment of the Nexus 7. Otherwise this is a great device.

Reviews.Title: Everything I wanted in a Tablet
Reviews.Author: SteveD "Steve"
Reviews.Content: Even though there are more flexible tablets available, the Kindle Fire HDX does everything that I want and does it well.

Reviews.Title: HDX
Reviews.Author: Paula Beaty "lilred"
Reviews.Content: I owned a Kindle Fire and really enjoyed it. I upgraded to the HDX. Am enjoying even more. The battery life is much longer. I can read a whole book without charging.

Reviews.Title: Better than Ipad air
Reviews.Author: Alonso
Reviews.Content: My kids love the new Kindle fire and I love the fact that I can control all they can see and play andset the reading goals before they can play or use it for something else.Really good device.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Would highly recommend
Reviews.Author: Maree Schiller
Reviews.Content: I love my Kindle. I can go onto the internet and use it just like a tablet. The quality resolution is fantastic. The Kindle is very light in weight. It is everything the spec's say it is. As an overseas purchaser I would highly recommend it. Love it!!!

Reviews.Title: Great for the commuter
Reviews.Author: Cheryl Paquet
Reviews.Content: I love this kindle.. I download movies from my prime account and watch them on the go..I love the books and games..

Reviews.Title: faster than a speeding bullet
Reviews.Author: Bubbefran "Very picky person"
Reviews.Content: I love my new Kindle Fire hdx. I had ordered a Google Nexus 7 older generation from another company and they cancelled my order at the last minute a day before christmas. I felt I still wanted a 7" tablet as my 10" tablet was getting too heavy for one handed use. I am so glad I ended up with this. It is all connected to my amazon account. My books, music etc. . It is  so light weight. One handed usage is a breeze. The only negative which I had not realized was that I have no access to the Play Store . While the amazon appstore has tons of apps there are still some I could not get for this one. I had spent months making progress in games that I have to access on my 10" tablet which I was planning on giving to someone else. Also there are a number of apps that say for the Kindle Fire but they do not work on the HDX. It is so new they say that I need to have patience for them to be developed for the HDX. I find this unacceptable. There are too many of these apps. Why are they not available for this fire but only the others. I am still learning some of the features so hence only 4 stars. Another negative and say this in jest is that it works so fast that when I am playing games I lose faster than before.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX
Reviews.Author: Paulette Freese
Reviews.Content: This is my first tablet, and overall I like it.  I have Amazon Prime, and purchased the Kindle with the intent to down load movies.  So far, I haven't gotten around to doing that.  It came with instructions as to how to connect to WiFi, so I got that going the first night.  I like the cloud sharing of books and photos from my phone.  Setting it up was not intuitive and I had to use the help key.  The help was fantastic, and got me set up with my books from the Kindle on my phone right away.  I chose the 4GLTE option so I could use it in areas where there is no WiFi.  I have not been able to figure out how to access the 4GLTE option.  I've downloaded several sets of instructions, but so far, no luck.  I may need to break down and call the help line again.  I'm sure that there are many more things I can do with it besides read books, but need to take the time to work with it.

Reviews.Title: Awesome screen
Reviews.Author: Patricia Hemphill
Reviews.Content: Just love my Kindle.  The graphics are incredible!  I only wish that I could have a choice of something other than white or black as a background for the eBooks.  I'd prefer a cream color (the stark white is a bit too bright for me) with dark black text.  There is an option for cream background but it has a gray text and that's not enough contrast.  Otherwise I have no complaints at all.

Reviews.Title: Good Product, Missing Key Features
Reviews.Author: Tim Stasko
Reviews.Content: I did not really obtain any special offers that are useful. I only have two real complaints thought. The fact that this Kindle come with absolutely no outside camera and does not have access to the Google play store are huge flaws. I bought the unit over the nook because it stated that the unit had a camera, but did not specify that it was only and front facing camera. Other than those issue the unit is great!

Reviews.Title: Great Screen
Reviews.Author: karatemom23
Reviews.Content: The colors and clarity of the screen are wonderful. Much nicer than my husbands tablet. Got the smaller one and am still happy with it

Reviews.Title: The Kindle Fire HDX 7" is great!
Reviews.Author: Karen M Boudreau
Reviews.Content: I am enjoying my Kindle Fire that I received as a Christmas gift. It's very easy to use, and I like being able to read books and the Bible on it. I like having the option to use different apps on it, and being able to do most everything online (checking email, using bank apps, Facebook, etc) without having to use a computer! I have downloaded a few games, and the quality of the graphics and the sound are excellent! I also bought this Kindle because of the camera feature - I'm going to be using Skype quite often to talk to friends and relatives out of state! I guess the only downfall is that if you don't have Wi-Fi available you can't use some of the features of the Kindle. But overall I would recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: The kindle hdx 7"
Reviews.Author: grayboy
Reviews.Content: The sound video and color were very good.But the battery life was not that great when watching a movie.But overall  I would buy it again

Reviews.Title: Pretty cool but...
Reviews.Author: Joseph Myerson
Reviews.Content: It is REALLY hard to quit apps. It has plenrty of memory to keep everything you've ever opened up and running, but dang what A pain to quit. It is kind of counter intuitive if one is familiar with iPads and Galaxy devices to buy apps. Also it is a bit of a challenge to navigate. That being said, it is sleek, stylish, has great battery life and a decently ranged wifi antenna. All in all, a solid 4. I feel it was money well spent.

Reviews.Title: GREAT PRODUCT
Reviews.Author: Nspyr
Reviews.Content: This is awesome and very light. I have a Note 10.1 but I bought a kindle for my wife. It is smaller and lighter than I expected. Not small where it would be uncomfortable to read from, but compact. the screen is clear. The only thing I didn't like was that it took several weeks to arrive. Other than that, all is well.

Reviews.Title: no problems with this one
Reviews.Author: R. P. Lewis
Reviews.Content: We own four Kindles and they all perform flawlessly. I love my older Fire for reading, browsing the web and for watching TV via the Sling Adapter. This newer unit was a gift for my son and has even more features than my older one -- including actual volume buttons (which mine lacks). The Kindle is a terrific device for the price -- and we've not encountered any of the problems mentioned in other reviews.

Reviews.Title: Great Gift
Reviews.Author: Betty D Bell
Reviews.Content: this kindle was a Christmas gift to my daughter and she absolutely loves it.  she does however have a problem with the camera part, apparently you can only take pictures that are facing the front of the kindle. this is not good because it does not seem you can take a picture of something you are looking at.

Reviews.Title: LOVE
Reviews.Author: jennifer curvey
Reviews.Content: The whole family LOVES the new Kindle Fire HDX.  We all have our favorite games on it, can check emails & even watch TV around the house or in the yard!!

Reviews.Title: Absolutely love it.
Reviews.Author: Grandma03
Reviews.Content: Absolutely love my kindle.  I got it very quickly and have used it everyday.  Even though it is the 7 inch, the graphics is great and I have watched a couple movies that are 3D and it is fantastic.  Best thing of all it fits in my purse quite well, and goes everywhere with me.

Reviews.Title: First Tablet Device
Reviews.Author: Michael D. Jarrell
Reviews.Content: This is our families first tablet style device. We use it as a reader, for games, and to store family photos, which it does each very well. Pictures are very clear and sharp. It was easy to connect it to PC and transfer photos. Wish it had better sub-folder options in the Pictures folder. As a reader it has a screen that is bright and easy on your eyes. Downloading books is a snap. Daughter plays games on it occasionally and the graphics is very good. The only reason I didn't give it 5 stars is I don't like that Amazon limits you on the Android App selection to what they offer on their website. Very Apple type approach that I don't care for. You cannot download Apps from Google Play to the Kindle. You can but it requires actions that can put the operational security of your Kindle at risk.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: deno
Reviews.Content: It's great! Just haven't got to use it much since I don't have Wi-Fi at home yet. I know that I'll enjoy it a lot.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 7"
Reviews.Author: EHU
Reviews.Content: Had difficulty using the display and had to learn by trial and error on  how to use it.  The screen is very clear and legible especially in lighted areas. I am not a techie and this is my first entrance into the tech world as a senior citizen. After several attempts on how to use Wi-Fi in different locations, i was able to connect with my local newspaper away from my home. I also downloaded a book which I read while traveling.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Item
Reviews.Author: Nathaniel Albert
Reviews.Content: Excellent Item.  Bought it as a Christmas gift for someone I love and they absolutely LOVED it.  I was impressed with the capabilities and the functionality of it.  It really is a great item to have, whether it's for personal use or as a gift.

Reviews.Title: GREATEST Kindle out there!
Reviews.Author: Jamie S. Chreiger "JamieSC"
Reviews.Content: My only problem with this product is that it doesn't seem to take a micro SD card to expand memory.  That's ok, though, the 2.2 ghz processor loads every single thing lightning fast and I picked the 64 gig 7" version, making it very handy to carry around.  Fantastic graphics as well...rivals the ipad as advertised.

Reviews.Title: the best
Reviews.Author: Joshua Jusino
Reviews.Content: way better than the ipad.  Works great for my daughter. we share it all the time.  better user setting too.

Reviews.Title: Outstanding product
Reviews.Author: Ginny
Reviews.Content: Received packed only in flat cardboard like a book.  I expected more packing for a package of this value.  The Kindle Fire HDX works beautifully and is easy to use.  I am still learning about it.

Reviews.Title: Far better than expected
Reviews.Author: M. Sheehy
Reviews.Content: I have not stopped using it in one capacity or another since I received it.  Thoroughly impressed with the speed and functionality of this inexpensive tablet.

Reviews.Title: The Commercials are Right!
Reviews.Author: Flash
Reviews.Content: I didn't think I would ever give up books...the books we read that are printed on paper. But on Cyber Monday, there was such a good deal on the Kindle Fire HDX 7", I decided to buy one. I love it! The brightly-colored images pop right out of the screen, just like the commercials. And I know I paid less than those who bought an ipod mini. I first used the Kindle to check email and for Facebook and then ordered my first book. It appeared wirelessly as promised. I live in the San Francisco Bay Area and holding the Kindle while standing on BART is so much easier than trying to hold and read a book. I don't think you'll regret buying a Kindle Fire HDX. It almost replaces my laptop (except for editing photos, when I prefer a bigger screen). I'm very glad I bought it.

Reviews.Title: Kindle vs Nook
Reviews.Author: sondra hurley
Reviews.Content: This was a gift for my 22 year old granddaughter.  She loves it.  Shops on line, going to order books to read, plays games.  Her favorite Christmas gift.  Thank you for making it affordable.

Reviews.Title: love my kindle fire hdx!
Reviews.Author: maryann
Reviews.Content: Works great.does everything I hoped it would and more.Some game apps freeze but that's it!  Love my kindle fire HDX!!!

Reviews.Title: It might be a great device if it would charge!!
Reviews.Author: John Eudy
Reviews.Content: The problem I have with the kindle is that it will not charge properly. I plugged it up for 24 hours and only got to a 56% charge. I am ready to return it for one that will charge properly. The weak link seems to be the charging port does not allign properly to the gap provided. I don't know if this is a design flaw or a poor assembly process.

Reviews.Title: AMAZING
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer "GrannyLibrarian"
Reviews.Content: What is not to like. The color is clear and vibrant. I'm looking for the perfect headset now. When I have a Migraine the Kindle HDX can read to me and I can rest. Everything about the Kindle HDX is AMAZING.

Reviews.Title: Amazing
Reviews.Author: Carol Raabe
Reviews.Content: I purchased the Fire HDX for my husband for Christmas and, since opening it, he cannot put it down.  He is amazed at the functionality, the convenient size and the limitless possibilities for downloading his favorite authors.  I scored big on this one!!

Reviews.Title: Nice
Reviews.Author: Antonia Madrigal
Reviews.Content: My son really enjoys the kindle. He plays and never gets bored like in any other devices.He loves it a lot

Reviews.Title: Great gift!
Reviews.Author: Jajayco
Reviews.Content: I purchased this as a gift for my Mom...the online assistant is great!  Easy to use and easy to get help!

Reviews.Title: Awesome Kindle.
Reviews.Author: Charlie
Reviews.Content: I absolutley love this Kindle.  It was a gift and I just finished my first book on it.  I use all the time.

Reviews.Title: My son love his new Kindle Fire
Reviews.Author: Lisa Johnson
Reviews.Content: He wasn't sure about it on Christmas day at first, but now loves it. He says it is easy to used and great for watching videos. I am very pleased with this gift for him and recommend buying it. Just make sure you click it as a gift at checkout or your amazon info goes directly into the Kindle. Luckily, CS helped me rectify the problem immediately.

Reviews.Title: Fast clear
Reviews.Author: chriswondoloski
Reviews.Content: display clear. colors jump. does everything I ask. my daughter was so impressed christmas day when she began using it that we decided to buy a second one that very day. disappointed that the second one I bought cost more! price already went up. we bought it anyway, but I felt shafted.

Reviews.Title: Much improved!
Reviews.Author: Nancy Jean Dalton
Reviews.Content: Much improved and more memory makes this generation of the Kindle far superior!  I also appreciate the live "help" when needed!

Reviews.Title: best purchase i ever made
Reviews.Author: Yolanda Castro
Reviews.Content: the convenience of this kindle and its vivid images are great.  the applications are easy to work with and fast.

Reviews.Title: Everyone loved it
Reviews.Author: Dennis S. Turner
Reviews.Content: I bought 4 four my sister, daughter, and grandkids.  They all love it and all of the games, books, movies, apps,a dn photos they can do.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Gerald Woodard
Reviews.Content: I love this product and easy to use,  takes a little time getting use to it, I would recommend to others. Thank you much

Reviews.Title: I love my Kindle Fire HDX
Reviews.Author: DLTL1980!
Reviews.Content: It is amazing how clear everything is.It was so easy to transfer books from my old Kindle to my Kindle Fire HDX.I was able to Skype on Christmas Day so we could talk to our son that lives in another state.It was worth buying just for Skype but I love reading on it.

Reviews.Title: nice tablet
Reviews.Author: frank campbell
Reviews.Content: Nice video quality and easy to navigate. Only wish camera wasn't limited to self facing only. Looking forward to future generation of tablets.

Reviews.Title: upgraded my kindle
Reviews.Author: love to read "Sheryl"
Reviews.Content: I recently upgraded my Kindle, my first was an original kindle fire.  The reason I upgraded was due to lack of space for apps.  Needless to say my new kindle has 64 GB and has been a dream to use.  There is only one thing that would make it better, it my opinion.  If there was a way to automatically create and assign collections as you purchase books.  If you think about it Amazon categorizes the books, just send the data and automatically assign.  Food for thought designers!

Reviews.Title: LOVEEE
Reviews.Author: Bonnie Billman
Reviews.Content: I haven't stopped playing and reading on this kindle since i got it. I definetly love it! Get yourself one!

Reviews.Title: Love My New Kindle Fire HDX
Reviews.Author: Colleen Fegan
Reviews.Content: Love everything about my new Kindle!!! Especially the May Day button-haven't used it but a few times but the customer service people are awesome and so fun to work with!! Thank you for coming up with this idea- it really helps us that are computer challenged!!!

Reviews.Title: Great

Reviews.Title: kindle fire hdx
Reviews.Author: Michael Hankins
Reviews.Content: Easy to use and you can can do anything. Love watching movies and.searching the web on this device. Love it!

Reviews.Title: New HDX is Awesome
Reviews.Author: Janine K. Upton "jtenscollectibles"
Reviews.Content: Received Kindle for Christmas and immediately started uploading apps to it. The only app I have not been able to get working is the HP e-print app for wireless printing. I plan to contact the Mayday support to help with this. Would like a camera on back of Kindle for taking pictures and USB port, but I'm sure that will come in a later model.  Vibrant colors, just like watching TV. Have used the Skype app and works well.  I like the Cloud features for storing pictures which I was able to upload from my smartphone.  Have not uploaded from home computer as I have years worth of pictures and do not want to have that many on the tablet for now. I would recommend the tablet to others that may be considering the Kindle Fire HDX.

Reviews.Title: Battery life poor
Reviews.Author: Don Burrill
Reviews.Content: The Kindle Fire HDX 7 is fast. But, I am disappointed in the battery life in sleep mode. If you want to preserve the battery life you need to shut it off

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: karla restrepo
Reviews.Content: the definition is really good, the camera is awesome, is fast and the screen is really clear,also the price is really good

Reviews.Title: Really like this tablet
Reviews.Author: Michael Schlosser
Reviews.Content: Really like this tablet, use it every day. I use it to read books and to play word games daily.

Reviews.Title: My wife loves it
Reviews.Author: Ted
Reviews.Content: It has not seemed to stump her yet and that is a blessing.  I just wish she would look at the instructions.

Reviews.Title: it beyond our expectations.
Reviews.Author: Danielle M. Kopatich
Reviews.Content: easy to operate, easy to download, easy to view....thanks for a fun product....its been enjoyable to own the Kindle. Thank You

Reviews.Title: kindle
Reviews.Author: Schwenker
Reviews.Content: Great picture for watching movies and reading books.  Very user friendly.  There are a lot of movies and book choices at Amazon to enjoy.  Light and compact.  Highly recommend this for yourself or as a gift.

Reviews.Title: new knidle
Reviews.Author: Gary L. Thompson "garyop"
Reviews.Content: like it a lot. Seems battery doesn't last as long as first kindle. But great, takes a second to download anything

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 7"
Reviews.Author: Jo Anna Chacho "JAC"
Reviews.Content: This Kindle meets all my expectations.  The HDX display is amazing for a 7" screen.  I'm really lovin' it and would highly recommend it to anyone who is looking for an ereader.

Reviews.Title: sweet little tab
Reviews.Author: Dan N.
Reviews.Content: pretty AWESOME. It's super fast. Colors look amazing. Simple to use. Big plus is that I can view my school power points and pdf files !

Reviews.Title: Great gift for my kids
Reviews.Author: Kathy Post
Reviews.Content: Great Christmas gift for my kids which are 6 and 9. At the very reasonable price,  I could afford to buy 2 so I didn't have to hear them fighting over them.  They offer everything they need and more.  And, I can set the parental controls and see the free games they are purchasing in my Amazon account as well.  My only complaint is that it takes a very long time to recharge the battery so you don't want to forget to plug it in overnight.  Definitely buy a sturdy case for little ones.  I bought the I-Biason case which has held us well despite the multiple drops already.

Reviews.Title: Best present ever given to my wife!
Reviews.Author: James
Reviews.Content: My wife is an avid reader. She is thrilled to have a library/bookstore in her hands. The 7" is working great. She can read at night with the backlit display and it looks just like a book page. The wifi is fast.  The colors are vibrant. Our friend bought one of those cheaper generic tablets under a 100.00 and it malfunctioned almost immediately. If you want to take pics with your Kindle, get the one with camera on both sides. But - she has a phone and a digital camera for that!

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX is the Best Tablet (Not just for the price!)
Reviews.Author: Brett Hall
Reviews.Content: Great product, Great value.Kindle fire has more than met my expectations and keeps impressing the more I use and play with it.

Reviews.Title: watch out iPad
Reviews.Author: Mr. Josh
Reviews.Content: I am very impressed with my Kindle FireHDX. You really can't beat this device for the money. Great picture quality and ease of use. Mayday is the real deal. Great tech support experience.

Reviews.Title: Staying with the Kindle
Reviews.Author: Robert H. Ward
Reviews.Content: Since we started several years ago with Kindle we have been more than satisfied. Satisfied to the point of upgrading every so often and our satisfaction is greatly met each time. Beside the clarity of the HD series we find that they are easy to understand and the tech help available is excellent as well.

Reviews.Title: great tablet
Reviews.Author: Amy  Willis
Reviews.Content: We have loved it ! No complaints wild recommend this kindle to any one ,Great picture , fast, lots a fun for our whole family

Reviews.Title: Kindle fire
Reviews.Author: Diane Carter
Reviews.Content: Great tablet for the price. I purchased this for my grandson and he loves it! He likes to play games on it as well.

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: Kathleen M. Joseph
Reviews.Content: My husband loves it! I only wish I had purchased the 8.9" screen. That will be for next Christmas!Kathy

Reviews.Title: Exceeded my expectations.
Reviews.Author: CORNELIUS J TOOMEY
Reviews.Content: Purchased 32GB model at Best Buy.  Great screen, excellent speed, no-brainer startup and easy-to-use.  Highly recommend to anyone interested in a tablet.

Reviews.Title: This item was a great buy. My 7 year old will not put it down he loves it.
Reviews.Author: Kippano Hamilton
Reviews.Content: This item was a great buy. My 7 year old will not put it down he loves it so much.

Reviews.Title: much more useful than my old fire.
Reviews.Author: Richard W. Donley
Reviews.Content: Using it more than my laptop for most everything  is much smaller and lighter than my first Fire. And battery lasts longer.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful!
Reviews.Author: Angela R Nitolo
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a gift and didn't realize that it immediately registered to my Amazon account; Christmas morning we used the 'Mayday' button right away and within 15 minutes the support team helped transfer me to customer service(through the kindle) and fix our registration and we were ready to roll. My fiancee loves it and so does our 4 year old son. I especially like that the HDX has the camera...I enjoy the surprise self photos my son takes.

Reviews.Title: I love my new Kindle!
Reviews.Author: April J.
Reviews.Content: I sold my Nook Tablet due to fears of Barnes & Noble just not being able to keep up with Amazon.  I got really tired of seeing all those free books available for the Kindle, and not having the same options available for the Nook.  I am SO glad I upgraded!  The Kindle Fire hdx (I chose the 64 gb, 7 in) is the BEST tablet out today and I challenge anyone to see for themselves how amazing it is!

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: dorothy
Reviews.Content: This is my second kindle fire, I am on both of them daily, Love them!  I am on Facebook daily & play games.

Reviews.Title: I love it
Reviews.Author: Michael R Jensen
Reviews.Content: I love it. it has a lot of things i can do i enjoy being able to read books and everything else

Reviews.Title: Kindle fire HD review
Reviews.Author: Elaine Glen
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a Christmas gift for my 14 year old granddaughter and she was thrilled when she opened it! She loves everything about it but, most of all, she loves that she is able to watch her favorite shows anytime she chooses anywhere she happens to be.

Reviews.Title: The Kindle Fire HDX is awesome!
Reviews.Author: Brenda F. Lewis
Reviews.Content: Love my Kindle Fire HDX! It is my second Kindle Fire and just don't want to be without one. Easy to use.

Reviews.Title: Good decision to buy!
Reviews.Author: irishjdf
Reviews.Content: The perfect choice for a 7" tablet. Remember most Android tablets don't have access to the Amazon Instant Store. Its fast, has very sharp vivid screen and images, and has all the apps you need. Youtube can indeed be run through the browser.

Reviews.Title: I'm SUPER-thrilled with this thing!
Reviews.Author: Shirley A. Burton "Oddball Extreme"
Reviews.Content: I upgraded from my old Kindle Fire to the HDX and am seriously GLAD I did! This was exactly what I needed, particularly for the e-book I downloaded to watch video segments on cooking. The picture is so clear, and I have had no problems with it so far. I'm very happy with what I've got and will definitely recommend it to others. It's worth the money!

Reviews.Title: Teenagers
Reviews.Author: DIANE G BOTTOM
Reviews.Content: I bought two of these for grandkids and they love them. Teenagers are very hard to please so these kindle fires deserve at least a four star rating.

Reviews.Title: meets all my needs
Reviews.Author: donna smith
Reviews.Content: Because I love everything about it it meets all my expectations take it everywhere I go can't live without it

Reviews.Title: Like KindleHDX
Reviews.Author: Nancy McDonald
Reviews.Content: I had the first Kindle out a couple years ago and thought I would upgrade to the newer one. Lovin it so far.

Reviews.Title: Great display! FreeTime rocks!
Reviews.Author: Todd
Reviews.Content: This is a great tablet computer with a wonderful screen. The hidden gem is FreeTime, which allows me to hand this to my kids knowing that they will find lots of books to read and educational applications without worrying about them getting into trouble on the Internet. I've been looking for a solution like this for a while with the iPad, and I had not been able to find anything. This is the first solution that I feel confident about and comfortable handing the Kindle to a child without worrying. Also I like that I can limit the total screen time for my kids while requiring that they read for a set period of time before they can play games or watch videos. It's pretty much exactly what I would have wanted in a solution for kids to use a tablet. The kids love it too!

Reviews.Title: Weak battery
Reviews.Author: Charles Smith
Reviews.Content: For this Kindle to operate you tied to a power cord. It certainly is not portable. What could I be doing wrong? Or is this a weak battery source?

Reviews.Title: Incredibly satisfied with the HDX, two annoyances.
Reviews.Author: Wren Bouley
Reviews.Content: I am really satisfied with this product. I was worried whether I would get enough use out of the device to justify the cost (First tablet), but no longer.Pros:The shipping was quick and on time and the packaging was excellent.The device was received with a full charge on the battery. the charger appears to be of great quality.Camera/picture quality is great. I Skype a lot.The battery life is very good thus far. I can get about 12 hours of steady web use, 8 hours of constant streaming, and have left it idle for 3 days off charge and still had 99% battery life. I can take it to work for 14 hours with sporadic work related use and end the day with 30% battery life.The device functions smooth and quick. The processing speed is top notch.The display is so clear, HDX is great for viewing pleasure. No problems reading books in sunlight.The speakers are very clear and can get quite loud.Navigation is easy, not confusing at all.Amazon's free app of the day are usually high quality apps.Amazon also has these kindle customer only lightning deals that offer some serious value.Cons:The Device has, on 4 separate occasions, refused to respond from sleep mode. Just a black screen, like the device has been switched off, and it will not respond from pressing or holding the power button. All 4 times I got frustrated at the lack of response and walked away from it for a few hours. When I came back it worked just fine like there had never been a problem. Was not a charging issue, the battery had plenty of life left and I did not have it on charge while I let it be for a few hours.Amazon and the Google play store do not get along.  The kindle is designed to actively block any attempt to access the play store. It can be worked around of course, but it is annoying that I must do that. The Amazon app collection is not very large in comparison and leaves a lot to be desired to me.Overall it's great, I use it all the time. I want to give it 5 stars but for the two reasons listed above I have to deduct one star.

Reviews.Title: Clearly Audible
Reviews.Author: A2D1
Reviews.Content: A big challenge for other tablets in the market.Meets 95% of daily users needs.Great item to own for the price.

Reviews.Title: Love It
Reviews.Author: Kenny Schoborg
Reviews.Content: I got into reading about a year go and decided to invest in a Kindle after talking with several friends.  I waited cyber Mon. And they had another deal on the Fire HDX.  I decided to go with the newest version and am glad I did.  I really like the May day button on it and have used it several times. The people you get to help you are easy to get Long with and very helpful.  My original intention for getting one was just for reading.  Two days after I got my Kindle the hard drive in my laptop went to toast.  It took a couple of days and a couple of times on the May day site to get it set up for my WiFi so I could stay up to date on my e-mail.  That has been a life saver there as it's been over 2 weeks I've been using the Kindle for my e-mail.  Being in my 60's the only thing I'll say I don't like is the small key board for typing out an e-mail.  It' like the young people texting and I don't care for that.  Oh well, it could be worse and that's only a minor issue.  Luckily, I work across from a younger lady that seems to know a lot about this and has helped out a lot in learning how to get the most out of my Kindle.  If you're thinking about getting one, don't hesitate, you won't be sorry.

Reviews.Title: this is my second Kindle...loved my Fire but the Fire HDX REALLY ROCKS!!!

I find it hard to believe that Amazon wasn't aware of this problem before the product was released to the public.  The same thing happened when I bought the Kindle Paperwhite a  year ago.  There are 4 obvious shadows at the bottom of the screen.  Once again, Amazon had to have known about this before the Paperwhite was released.I think Amazon is a great "store" but their quality control leaves something to be desired.Hopefully there will be an update for the Kindle Fire HDX in the near future.  The way the Kindle Fire is now, I would not recommend a purchase.

Reviews.Title: Much Better Than My Previous Kindle
Reviews.Author: Kyle Young
Reviews.Content: Before I got this I had the Kindle Fire 1st Gen. I got this and have fallen in love with the improvements that have been done to the Kindle Fire. It is lighter than the original fire and works much better in my opinion. It fits the needs I require which are reading, movies, games, and browsing the web. I don't care for all the fancy technical stuff or connecting to TV at really, I'm happy as long as it does what I need it to do.

Reviews.Title: Great device but lacking output/apps for external devices (TV, Receiver)
Reviews.Author: someone
Reviews.Content: There are many reviews for this device, but not much information about how to output the device display content to external TV/monitor. So, I'll share my experience with that part in case it could be useful for someone else looking for that functioanlity.I had this for few weeks, and basically can echo many other reviewers. Excellent build quality, display, Amazon apps. If you're planning to use this device just to shop, read, watch videos on Amazon (on Kindle display) I doubt you could find anything else even close. However, if you want to output the display or sound content to an external device like a TV it all starts to go downhill. I want to highlight these issues since I could not find any details on the web (except very few).For some reason, Amazon does not provide apps such as "Pioneer Control App" and "Panasonic Remote 2". These are essential for me to control my TV and receiver from Kindle, so I could use them as a workaround for at least playing my own music/video library. To make matters worse, there's no other display output (like DLNA, through the home network). Kindle does not have an HDMI port, and the USB port does not work as a "Slim Port". So, I tried the "Kindle Certified" NetgearPush2TV. A real dissapointing experience. I wrote a separate review for that. Apparently Amazon tech support (and Netgear support) does not know much about this (I spoke with at least 4 agenrts, if I remember correctly). All Amazon agents were great, but couldn't help. So, if you plan to use the Kindle for the following then you'll be dissapointed:1. Play music from Kindle to your networked (aka connected) receiver2. Play videos (from internet/Amazon Instant Videos and from your own library) from Kindle to a networked TV3. GPS (e.g. with CoPilot) --- Kindle does not have a GPS, which I realized after buying. My bad, not whining hereA modern high-end device like Kindle should provide this sort of basic functionality, in my opinion. I was surprised to learn these limitations (the hard way). There are apps for this sort of thing (e.g. Flips/iMediaShare) but they're far from perfection with many limitations. I tried very hard to keep the Kindle and find workarounds for the limitations mentioned above but I could not. So I had to return it.Since then I bought a Nexus 7. Only problem I have is that Amazon does not allow it to access Instant videos (I knew this before I bought it but still weird, because I can use any other device and don't see how Amazon makes money by blocking it. Kindle is really cheap, so, also hard to understand how they make lot of money by selling the hardware. So, I'm confused but there must be some reason other than just Amazon/Google rivarly). I don't watch videos very often (but my son takes care of that for me with his Kindle) so it's not a huge isue for me at this point.Again, you need to read this review very carefully since I did not attempt to highlight lot of good aspects of the device since others have already mentioned those; if the extra networking/navigation/output functionality is not needed for you then the Kindle is an excellent device.

Reviews.Title: Lovely little tablet. Really enjoying it.
Reviews.Author: Christine Hill
Reviews.Content: This is the first tablet I've ever owned so I can't really compare it to anything else out there on the market but I am enjoying my Kindle a lot. There is no way I could afford a new iPad and after using this, I don't think I would want one anyway. I use this primarily for reading, watching videos and movies, and occasionally surfing the web, so nothing terribly extensive. It suits my needs just fine, at a lower price point and makes me feel like getting an iPad would just be overkill for me. I purchased mine with the adds included and honestly it's not a big deal. They're not intrusive with whatever I might be doing on the tablet and if it bothered me that much I would just pay the $15 to have them removed. There are some deals that are exclusive to kindle fire owners which is pretty awesome and since I use amazon quite often for purchases, I don't mind a chance at snagging a good deal. There are plenty of apps to pick from (for my purposes anyway) like Facebook, Youtube, and a few games here or there. It's lightweight and easy to hold for reading while lounging around in bed and the movies I've watch show up in beautiful quality. I would definitely recommend a kindle tablet to anyone who is looking for a tablet for entertainment purposes but is hesitant to shell out the cash for one of the more expensive brands. Overall I am very happy with this purchase.

Reviews.Author: SoMom
Reviews.Content: Overall this is a nice-to-have for those of us who choose not carry large screen smart phones, however I have repeatedly gotten frustrated while I was reading or typing and the screen reset to a previous screen or the top of the page - arrrgh.My other beefs are with the short battery life and complexity of trying to print from the device.One of the main reasons I purchased the product was compatibility with Office. I bought the MS Office Pro app immediately, but the limitations are so great that it is practically useless and even though it is not supposed to require the font package to work, a pop-up constantly reminds me that I do need it.Not a total waste of money, but close.

Reviews.Title: I couldn't be happier with the Kindle Fire HDX 7!!!
Reviews.Author: jmbl
Reviews.Content: This device was a present to me for Xmas and I had no idea it was coming. I had been looking at tablets prior to Xmas for myself but could not make up my mind. Well, my daughter made it for me without my knowledge and she chose an outstanding product. It's use is very intuitive and easy to set up. You'll be surfing in fifteen minutes without the need for technical support. But, in case you need assistance, it's built right into the device as an online "visual" chat function. Getting Amazon Prime was an added bonus as I've made a few subsequent related accessories purchases that gave me free shipping. This device is "special" and very easy to use. It's very fast in all its operations and adding security to this device for your network is a snap. Those of you who are fortunate enough to own this device know what I mean. Buy one! You won't be sorry. Mine is connected to my home wireless network so I don't have to worry about data charges or a cell phone plan. Surfing is a breeze and, personally, I like this device over other similar tablet devices from other manufacturers.

Reviews.Title: great

Reviews.Content: great change from original kindle have upgraded each year.battery life much better.will wait till next to see what is new.

Reviews.Title: Love Kindle Fire HDX

Reviews.Content: Kindle Fire Hdx7 is very lightweight and easy to use. This is my first Tablet and I found it very easy to use the apps and other functions.

Reviews.Content: My Fire is addicting, oh no .......love it the May day is terrific, just purchased a cover for it. Amazon service is great and the Prime has paid for its self.

Reviews.Title: great

Reviews.Content: This is my 3rd kindle. I keep upgrading.  It does what a need and  more.  Only thing I'd change is the camera on the outside for pics not of myself

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Tina
Reviews.Content: I got the Kindle Fire HDX 7" as a gift and I've been using it for about 1.5 months now. I haven't owned a tablet before but I've played around on other's iPads. I feel like this tablet is very comparable to an iPad but at almost half the cost, I would pick the Kindle every time. I chose the 7" instead of the 8.9" because I like the smaller tablet and I personally would never hold up something so big to take a picture, especially when I have my phone or digital camera.Cons:- There is a blue/purple haze around the border of the screen that is visible on white. It actually doesn't bother me at all but it does bother some people. I don't even notice it's there unless I specifically pay attention to it. Even though it doesn't bother me, I would rather it not be there.- Battery life isn't great compared to the iPad. For the same amount of use, I'm used to charging every 2 weeks or so instead of every 3-4 days.- I don't like that the charger is plugged in at an angle instead of straight on. It's not really THAT big of an issue but it does take more effort than usual to plug it in.- This is more my fault for not reading/understanding the Prime benefits, but you only get the benefits of Prime if your account pays for it, not when you get added and another account pays for it (which completely makes sense). I was really looking forward to "borrowing" Kindle books for free and downloading movies to watch later offline but my husband wanted to keep paying for prime on his account and I didn't want to put my Kindle under his account or have both of us pay for Prime.Overall, I love my Kindle and it's a great tablet for the price. I haven't tried the Mayday feature yet but I'm glad it's there if I ever need to use it.

Reviews.Title: Perfect in every way.
Reviews.Author: afab4
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a Christmas gift for my wife to upgrade her original Kindle reader.I thought about getting her a Nexus 7, they are a nice product but I am glad I bought this instead.  She absolutely loves it.

Reviews.Title: Given as a Gift ...
Reviews.Author: Dan
Reviews.Content: My personal exp. w/ this device - It arrived in a  well designed package w/ all contents needed n w/ 73% power already - some apps r not compatible w/ the HDX that were fine on HD --Take precaution when searching 4 apps in Amazon store not all r compatible -- the device is thinner n a lot lighter - Once u familiarize yourself w/ the device ( easy 2 navigate ) - battery charge time only 4 hrs. -- the camera takes wonderful video / photos : additional options available 4 use w/ the camera -- one drawback > front camera only -if u desire front / back u would have 2 purchase 8.9 device -- pixels woo -- mayday feature haven't used it  yet -- has voice 2 text feature--

Reviews.Title: Great tool for everyone.
Reviews.Author: RSF
Reviews.Content: This device is well designed, color is excellent, good battery life, good sized screen, easy to use and generally all around handy device to have and the price is excellent for what you get.  I bought this for a friend and I haven't let them use it yet since I have been having such a good time with it.  This is the perfect device for the dedicated reader/traveler/movie buff especially with Amazon Prime.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful
Reviews.Author: D. Hickie "pooldoc"
Reviews.Content: I have the first gen. Kindle Fire hd. The Hdx is definitely an upgrade. The picture is clearer and more defined. It is faster when opening videos and apps. I like the placement of the volume and power buttons better. I like the fact that the camera is already set up to use without having to install an app to access it. Its not the greatest camera but taking pics with a tablet isn't ideal anyway. The battery life seems to be a little better. Worthwhile purchase!

Reviews.Title: Great Tablet at a Great Price
Reviews.Author: Paul Clark
Reviews.Content: Bought this tablet for myself for Xmas. Looked at other tablets (i.e. Apple iPad Mini), but I just couldn't justify the costs of those tablets when this tablet had all of the features that I wanted at a substantially lower price.  I bought this tablet while Amazon was having their Black Friday Sale on them ($179 for the 16GB) but a paid a little bit more for the 32GB tablet.  I'm using the tablet to check emails, read books, watch videos & movies, and have downloaded some apps so far.  The display is excellent and the processor is very fast.  I did purchase the Otterbox Defender case for this tablet which I also recommend, especially if you have little ones like I do who tend to get their hands on the tablet.  The extra protection is well worth the investment. Overall, I am very happy with my purchase and feel that I got the best "bang for my buck" buying this tablet.

Reviews.Title: Great Tablet
Reviews.Author: kcallahan47
Reviews.Content: I've used the iPad for a few years and now like this one better.  I bought the one with the higher memory to download shows and watch them off-line.  My iPad is only 16Gb and is quite full with Apps, pictures, and a couple of videos.  I love the clarity of the display.  Even though I bought the 7" version it's very clear and I can easily read the small text.  I've already watched a couple of TV shows and a movie.  I strongly recommend you get the Amazon Prime to go along with this Kindle.  I've had Prime for a couple of years and the benefits are great.

Reviews.Title: It still works after going through the dishwasher
Reviews.Author: Nichole garber
Reviews.Content: So I haven't had my Kindle for very long, I received it as a birthday present on December 20th and was loving using it for games, facebook and recipes since the screen is much bigger than my IPhone.  On Christmas day I used my kindle as my cook book for my entire Christmas feast but the day after Christmas I couldn't find it at all, I looked everywhere.  It turns out that my grandmother who has Alzheimer was doing the dishes and put it in the dishwasher, the dishwasher was run the next morning on the hottest/longest setting and my husband found it and just about lost his mind!  He immediately put it in a bag of rice to try to dry it out.  It turns out that the thing still works!  I cant even believe it.  There is distortion on the screen and I'm pretty sure that it isn't showing the correct battery percentage because it is at 0% and still on, but it turns on and runs apps.  It makes me so sad because I was really enjoying it for the few days that I had it but It just goes to show that this product is very durable even it put through harsh conditions!  I hope to get a new one soon that wont be put in the dishwasher or submerged in any kind of water because I really like this tablet a lot!

Reviews.Title: Well worth it!
Reviews.Author: Marla Danis
Reviews.Content: Great tablet! Great value! We are an Apple family but for our 5 year old we read reviews and chose the HDX. It's perfect! Amazon coins have been a great value!

Reviews.Title: This review in not about the functionality of the kindle but the lack of information in the box
Reviews.Author: Dee "Damomo2"
Reviews.Content: I bought this, as a gift for my 72 year old mother. The first problem was that even though I marked it as a "gift" it was registered in my name. Her generation (mostly) is not tech savvy and we bought this model due to the mayday button. She lives 1000+ miles away so I could not help her with set up and it took her almost 3 weeks to get it set up, so she could use it. ( this was due to the fact that it was registered to me.) She was on the phone for several hours( at least 3+ hours and 3 separate calls ) with tech support before they figured this out. I understand that the registration process is intuitive for most generations BUT a simple fact sheet with a tech support phone number would have been very helpful. She had to hunt down the number, for herself. She was nervous when she didn't find anything other then the kindle, in the box. I concede that this might have prolonged the delay in getting it set up. I know she is going to LOVE this once she isn't afraid that it will be a hassle to use.

Reviews.Title: God help you if you have to call customer service...
Reviews.Author: Robert W. Segrest Jr. "Dog Lover"
Reviews.Content: So...I bought the Kindle Fire HDX 7" for my son for Christmas.  Things started off fine, but when the charge ran out, and we went to recharge the item, it would not come on again.Here comes the issue...I texted customer service (apparently not in this country) and while the person was exceedingly pleasant, it was clear from the beginning that the person did not fully grasp my questions.  Ultimately, I found out today that instead of shipping me a Kindle Fire HDX 7" (which I had told the individual was my item), I was shipped a Kindle Paperwhite.I just got off the phone with "Ted", who also was clearly not from this country, and although exceedingly pleasant proceeded to put me on hold for 15 minutes.  I confirmed that he was sending me another Kindle Fire HDX 7" before I got off the phone with him.We'll see.  I'm pretty aggravated any time I have to deal with Amazon Customer Service.  Might want to re-think this guys!

Reviews.Title: Love it.
Reviews.Author: Carolyn DeVries
Reviews.Content: My husband love this Kindle. Got it for him for Christmas. He never thought he'd like an e-reader, but now he's hooked with all that's available to him with WiFi.

Reviews.Title: PRICED JUST RIGHT
Reviews.Author: Taalib
Reviews.Content: This is a great product I'm totally satisfied with it I use it around the home, it's like having small mini laptop and it's great for watching movies and of course the Amazon system is top notch order on my products when using this tablet.

Reviews.Title: Love it!!
Reviews.Author: Kristal Allen
Reviews.Content: I bought it for my daughter who is in college and she loves it!!  She can take it to class instead of carrying her laptop and do everything she needs to on her Kindle.  This is her second Kindle product.  Glad I bought it for her!

Reviews.Title: WOW - I'm a Believer!
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: We bought 2 kindles this holiday season and we love them.  They are small and fit comfortable in your hands, easy set up, easy screens to screens, everything is at your finger tips.  I love the parent controls and the mayday button is so useful.  My son loved the mayday button, he thinks we can just call them and talk!  LOL  We are trying out the amazon prime membership- so far so good, but of course the  movies we want you have to pay for it...  I high recommend this kindle for everyone.

Reviews.Title: Christmas surprise
Reviews.Author: Travis Leonard
Reviews.Content: My wife had been wanting one since they first came out. So if course that's the only thing she wanted for Christmas. Well we both decided that we weren't going to get each other gifts this year because money is extremely tight. But when it went on sale I just had to get it, and boy I'm glad I did. She absolutely loved it, and I was the best husband ever.

Reviews.Author: Mathew Carruthers
Reviews.Content: Very versatile device for all my entertainment needs when I'm on the go, but I just wish the app store had a better selection of word processing apps.  Plenty of note-taking apps, but only minimal word processing stuff.  The perks of being an Amazon Prime member are worth it - so many freebies to take advantage of...

Reviews.Title: Nice
Reviews.Author: Donald Mascot
Reviews.Content: It is everything that it's advertised as.  But I am still trying to figure out what I can use it for.  It's a nice eReader...probably the best.  And I can read and write email.  And I downloaded an app so I can view documents and spreadsheets.  And it shows my pics very nice.  But since I don't play any games, or watch movies on it, I am still wondering what the fuss is all about.  And I am sure I would be asking the same thing if I had an iPad.  But for the price, it's a very nice little device.

Yes they are competitors but c'mon I have still subscribed to Prime. If Amazon offered to add my owned hard copy DVDs and BluRays to their Cloud then I wouldn't complain. Amazon please add this feature or give up the app battle.

Reviews.Title: I love my Kindke HDX 7"
Reviews.Author: DN
Reviews.Content: My hubby got me the 7" hdx for Christmas gift and I love it! Resolution is soooo nice, I like the size it's not bulky, slim and light, perfect for travel, product works fast. I can play games and steam movies in Netflix. We so love the product that we got obe for our son. I definitely Recomend thu product!

Reviews.Title: Best gift to myself!!!
Reviews.Author: bunnywright
Reviews.Content: Anyone who has vision problems and has had to give up paper books this is it.  I purchased it for reading only but bought the HDX so my grandchildren can enjoy the games when they come to visit.  It gets plenty of use.

Reviews.Title: love it

Reviews.Content: not sure if it would be what I needed as being a newbe to electronics son has Netflix able to watch movies on his account books I would like to see rent for free for a month

Reviews.Title: Kindle # 4...
Reviews.Author: Gailbert1
Reviews.Content: ...and I love it! I started with a kindle (3rd gen), then kept upgrading like a tech junkie every time a new one came out...after reading reviews on the HDX online, st first I was a little worried about the "purple haze" issue everyone mentioned. But, after watching a YouTube video showcasing the actual performance of the tablet,I decided that little issue want enough to dissuade me, so  my husband went ahead and got it for me for Christmas. Once again, I think the performance of the kindle fire HDX outweighs that of the iPad on pretty much every front: display, processing speed, features ( I have no desire to use my tablet as a camera, so for those who would vote that as a deal breaker, it was moot for me). I love all the features, and even tho I have not yet used the Mayday feature, I think that is a great addition as well...no need to make an appointment to speak to a"genius"...mine lives in my device!! Once again, kindle delivered.  I am a kindle user for life!

Reviews.Title: Love the new HDX kindle!!!!
Reviews.Author: Doneit "Doneit"
Reviews.Content: Picture is exquisite and the sound is fantastic.Bought this one as a replacement for my previous 7" [my puppy got a hold of it].I loved the one I had, but this one definitely takes it up a notch.Highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: My Second Kindle - Love It
Reviews.Author: Joyce
Reviews.Content: Bought my first Kindle Fire two years ago.  My husband suggested I get a new Fire HDX this year.  Can't tell you how much I love the new HDX, but still use my old one too, just can't seem to let it go. Love this product and I am sure there are more in my future.

Reviews.Title: Gift

Reviews.Content: This was a great gift to give my wife she loves it. Maybe she  wont go blind looking at her cell phone.

Reviews.Title: Love this tablet!
Reviews.Author: Lisa Lovett
Reviews.Content: I love this little machine! It can do it all!  Love the clarity of the screen. I bought this as a gift for my husband. Now I want one for myself.

Reviews.Title: Beautiful and functional!
Reviews.Author: Thomas Textor "Sail Daddy"
Reviews.Content: This Kindle has a beautiful display and the addition of selected Apps make it comparable to many tablets as well. The size is small enough for a reader, but still large enough for personal viewing of videos and other applications as well.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 7"
Reviews.Author: blueyz132000 "Kay"
Reviews.Content: Love my new Kindle Fire...wish I could have afforded the 8.5" but I do love it and the feature.  Still learning all the tricks.

Reviews.Title: Awsome Tablet!
Reviews.Author: Mike Thorn
Reviews.Content: I never owned a tablet before but decided to give Amazon a shot with there Kindle line up after reading a lot of positive reviews and I couldn't be happier. The tablet itself is very quick, the graphics are great, the whole tablet experience with books, music, video games, apps etc.. is just well rounded and easy to use. I personally haven't bought or picked up a book to read in years and within days of owning this I decided to download a book and now I'm back in the game reading books! Can't say nothing negative about this tablet so far it just seems like Amazon put there time into building this and it shows!

Reviews.Content: So far I've had no problems with my Kindle. I was foolish enough to buy a nook a few years back and learned from that experience to never do that again. Kindle is just what I wanted in what I would call a small tablet.

Reviews.Content: Awesome tablet! Awesome price! Awesome High Definition! Thank you Amazon for making this awesome tablet! My son who is 13 loves this tablet! My daughter who is 9 has the kindle fire 2nd generation from last year's Christmas presents and she loved that! but she really loves her brother's HDX! Perfect for my kids! Since they both love to read, watch movies, play games and research their homework!  Plus great customer service!

Reviews.Title: kindle fire hdx
Reviews.Author: shane foley
Reviews.Content: It's great in every way. The screen is so sharp, mayday is very helpful. Can't think of anything bad about it.

Reviews.Title: awesome

Reviews.Content: this was bought for grandson and dang I am jealous. I have the reg kindle fire and what this one can do is amazing and my daughter can keep her stuff separate from the kid zone that he is locked in so no purchases or places he shouldnt be this is well worth the purchase

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 7
Reviews.Author: Wealthygirl
Reviews.Content: I love my new Kindle Fire HDX 7!  Already tried the May Day feature and service was excellent!  Vivid color and excellent audio features. Would recommend this product to anyone considering making this purchase.

Reviews.Title: Loving my new Kindle Fire HDX
Reviews.Author: MamabearArndt
Reviews.Content: I received my new Kindle Fire HDX 7" on Christmas Eve as a gift to myself.  I had spend the last three months trying to decide between the Kindle and the new iPad Mini retina display.  At first I thought I might have made a big mistake choosing the Kindle mainly for the $275 savings over the iPad for the 64GB WiFi only model. I have had a iPhone for 4 years and have become very accustom to the functionality of the Apple products.  It took me only 24 hours to discover how to navigate the Kindle.  And I LOVE it.All of that being said there is 1 thing I wish Kindle would chance.  Kindle does not have "podcasts" for download.  Some of my favorite news podcasts are not available on Kindle at all and what is available can not be downloaded ONLY viewed through streaming which only works when I am on WiFi.  This limits when I can view these programs.

Reviews.Title: So much fun
Reviews.Author: Bonnie
Reviews.Content: I'm still learning how to use my new Kindle Fire, but so far I'm having a great time with it.  It is soooo clear and the sound is amazing for such a small I-pad.  I got it on sale at Christmas and was thrilled with the quality.

Reviews.Title: The world in your hands.
Reviews.Author: GPF "guitran"
Reviews.Content: I have been looking at tablets for several years, and already own the Kindle reader (which I enjoy for the convenience of reading and some games).  The Kindle Fire HD 8.9" was  a Christmas present to myself, and it was a great price to boot.  I found the setup to be ridiculously simple (already having an amazon account and another kindle), but I think that even first time owners will be pleased.  The videos on HD are very crisp (using a high speed router and Xfinity), and optional "Amazon Prime" for $79 a year provides the owner not only with free 2 day shipping on all "Prime" items purchased, but thousands of movies and shows are included.  There are a good number of "apps" available (many are free), and hundreds of free games.  For the price, this tablet certainly provides a quality interface with the internet and is more convenient that sitting at a desk or carrying a laptop.  I have also found many books and guides (borrow from Prime or purchase) that will help users to get the most out of their Kindle.  If you love videos or reading, playing games, "Skyping", or even phone calls (yes, there is a way to do that), I believe that you love this tablet.  Your only decision is whether to spend more for the "HDX" version, which adds capacity and speed, or for additional memory.  I am not a huge picture or video collector, so the 16 Gigabyte HD is perfect.  It is also a beautiful thing to look at.

Reviews.Title: Nice Product
Reviews.Author: Denise DeLamarter
Reviews.Content: I really like my husband's new Kindle.  My daughter and I both have older models.  We loved ours, until we saw the new one!

Reviews.Title: Excellent sound!
Reviews.Author: Leslie R Cooper
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a gift for someone who has never owned a tablet and isn't particularly computer savvy.  The OS is easy to navigate, and I love that there is live help just a button away.  The display is also gorgeous and sharp.  But what really surprised me was the sound quality!  I love watching movies and tv shows on my iPad, but if I'm doing anything other than sitting down and watching, the sound is inadequate without some auxiliary speaker.  The first movie I turned on with the Kindle Fire HDX was plenty loud enough to walk away, with a really great tone - rich, not tinny.  I also love the size - it's definitely a strong competitor for the iPad mini.I love my iPad because I'm a student and the apps there just integrate well for me, but if I wanted a top notch entertainment device, I would definitely get this again.

Reviews.Content: This tablet is excellent for the money. Has the Apple Air beat hands down in display, weight and price, just like the tv commercials. I have been using this since the 25th and the only complaint I have is my own doing, I should have gone for the 8.9" size. I also have the original Fire and when I registered this one, all my contents from the old one was already on the new one. Very convenient. I have not used the new Mayday feature or bluetooth function, so I can't comment on that. The browser and speed downloads are as advertised, fast! Overall very pleased. Great value for the price.

Reviews.Content: What can I say, I love my Kindle and use it all the time. I wish I had gotten the larger memory version,but oh, well, I will just not download so much to the unit, but keep it in the Cloud. Great sound, just loud enough and great visual clarity!!

If you have any questions you just select the mayday button and a representative comes on live chat with you to help.  Pretty awesome.....
