Reviews.Title: I love my kindle but,
Reviews.Author: webbrat
Reviews.Content: I like to read for 5 or 6 hours a night sometimes longer if I can't sleep and even if I place the kindle on "airplane mode" I don't get that much time on my battery.  I really worry for when I am traveling and can't get to a place to plug it in. I also worry because my connection where one has to plug it to recharge is getting sloppy.  I really have move the cord around to get it to charge and then hope the air currents don't change it.  This happens with both the cords I own.  This is also the 2nd hdx I've had.  This one is only 3 weeks old and now it is starting up with problems.  So while I love everything about my kindle (I don't even mind the ads) I am really in a spot with what to do now. This is also the reason for four stars.

Reviews.Title: amazing
Reviews.Author: tony solino
Reviews.Content: Theirs no other tablet on the market that can top this one.  If you buy this tablet it would be the best investment.

Reviews.Title: WOW Kindle HDX is great and so is the help!
Reviews.Author: Brian
Reviews.Content: This Kindle Fire HDX is great. The performance far exceeds my expectations and the screen clarity is SUPER. The help line is great. But, the people manning the help line need a little more training. They couldn't help on a few problems, minor as they were!That was ok for now but, what if something major comes up?Other than that it is a great little tool and were having a good time using it. It's handier than a lap top.

Reviews.Title: kindle review
Reviews.Author: Jan Murray
Reviews.Content: Very happy with my new kindle. It does everything my friends iPad does but at a much lower purchase price. Still learning all the different apps available.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX is just as good as an iPAD
Reviews.Author: Tonia Randolph
Reviews.Content: This is my 3rd kindle.  There are so many great things I can say about the Kindle Fire HDX.  The upgrades just only get better and I highly recommend anyone to purchase this especially if you are a work-play type person on the go like I am.  I love all the game, business, book, and etc apps.  Amazon has very good deals on their digital apps/books.  Just make sure you get the protection plan to protect your toy and make the best of all the uses that this wonderfully created device has to offer.  I will forever be a kindle fan.  The price is within my budget.  I love it.  Keep the modern technology of the kindle fire HDX coming!

Reviews.Title: Finally, Amazon got this mostly right!
Reviews.Author: A. Wertheim "werthla"
Reviews.Content: I have the Kindle HD, iPad, and Surface 2 just for background.I have a lot of problems with HD in terms of its claim to being a tablet - the internet is very fussy, it's slow and is simply not reliable as a tablet.  But it's a great E reader.I wanted a good 7 inch tablet.  I bought a returned the Google Nexus 7.  It was great except for no browser having a reading pane which is important in a small tablet.  You would think Google would have this in Chrome but no.  The screen is the best in class.I went to Best Buy and they had the HD and HDX side by side.  I compared the internet and there was no comparison - they HDX was very fast so I bought it to try out.  Happy to report that this is now a true tablet in that the Silk browser is much improved,, the quad core makes all the difference, the internet is now very usable and fast.HDX also has improvements over the HD - you can slide up from the bottom to access recently used programs which is very important if you need to switch between apps since only Surface allows you to keep two apps open simultaneously in the tablet world.  This works better than iPad.A page from other androids - you swipe down to see email and other notifications.The power button is now accessible!Size is smaller and slimmer.Some have noticed that there is a purple haze to the background.  That's true and that's something you have to judge for yourself if it bothers you.There is a limit on the number of tabs you can open on the Silk browser.Battery life is improved over HD.  It now comes with a cable and wall charger.There is no rear camera.  If that's important to you, consider the iPad Mini.  OR you can buy a real camera for the price difference.In summary, there is really no reason to buy the HD unless the price is $100.  The HDX is now a good competitive tablet.  The app store remains a problem if you depend on apps for games.  I have found some surprisingly good specialty apps.This is smaller than the iPad Mini and almost half the price.  Unless you are trapped in the Apple ecosystem and need their apps, (there isn't much you can't get from the web sites) this is a good alternative.

Reviews.Title: ABSOLUTELY fantastic
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: I wish I had WiFi in my home, so I can enjoy it even more. Love May Day button- the people have really helped me a number of times. Don't understand why my book pages don't turn like the advertisement- someone needs to tell us why. Easy to download- great color and sound too. This is my 4th Kindle-- got to control myself on upgrades BUT the people I have given them to have enjoyed my spending!!

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX
Reviews.Author: Karen M. Hooker "luv2read"
Reviews.Content: I love my Kindle fire HDX, it's the perfect adult companion, I take it with me everywhere. It's fully equipped with games, books, movies and much more.It's easy to use and I have to hide it from my husband and two year old daughter who seem to use it more than me. It has a wide variety of free applications and the quality of the Hd screen is perfect for reading a nd viewing movies. It's never a dull moment with the Kindle Fire HDX,  I plan on purchasing two more so I can enjoy it without interruption. Lastly, the price is reasonable, can't be beat!!!

Reviews.Title: It's perfect for mom
Reviews.Author: Greg Shires
Reviews.Content: My mom loves her "basic" kindle.  I wanted to get her one that lights up and has access to internet, facebook, email, etc.  She loves it, so far she still just reads on it but I'm hoping she'll eventually use it for more.

Reviews.Title: The greatest 7" tablet for me!!
Reviews.Author: Morgan Ryker
Reviews.Content: When glancing around for tablets @ Peter Jones' dpt store (John Lewis) in London, the most appealing tablet I noticed was the Kindle Fire HDX 7. Since this tablet cannot yet be purchased in The Netherlands in a store, this was the only chance for me to pick it up and feel and explore it. I loved the design, the feel, the incredible clarity and mega-fast processor.Back home, I tested a lot of tablets at a Dutch local megastore. Google Nexus seemed appealing, then Samsung tab 3.0, but I disliked the shapes, too long/narrow screen proportions. LG Gpad 8.3 was another temptation, but again: that weird long narrow screen? I jumped on to Apple's Ipad Mini 2. Bigger screen than the average 7" and just perfectly proportioned. Simply not being an Apple's type of guy, I hesitated. What held me back at Ipad Mini 2, were the limitations of dropping audio and video files on it. You would have to use Itunes for almost everything and convert many movie files.With Kindle, I wasn't sure about its Amazon-tunnel-vision strategy. But I also read there were a lot of ways to sideload apps outside the Amazon app-convent.From the day I received it (3 days after purchase, this gets UPS delivered to your doorstep and yes, they do ask your neighbours to receive it on your behalf in case you're not at home), I have not regretted this purchase for one second.I like Amazon products a lot. I do read Kindle books. But I like Kobo also. No problem, on youtube there's a perfectly clear instruction video on how to bring Kobo to your Kindle, and the two do peacefully co-exist.Magazines: lovely, cheap and easy to order, a delight to page through on this tablet.PDF files, Word documents: perfect viewing.For more extensive typing, I purchased the Perixx Periboard-805L, which works like a charm as a bluetooth wireless foldable keyboard for my Kindle tablet.Kindle Fire HDX 7 had my first attention, and remained my ultimate choice. Best case to keep it protected in my opinion: Poetic Slimline. Thank you, Amazon! A very happy customer.

Reviews.Title: Very Good but not intuitive
Reviews.Author: RetiredDIY
Reviews.Content: I bought this because I wanted an e-reader that I could do more with then just read books.  So far I like it very much but find that it does not give great directions for how to use some of its features. I am still trying to discover HOW to sync documents, if I finally get it done I would give this item 5 stars.

Reviews.Title: WOW!
Reviews.Author: Susan J. Smith
Reviews.Content: My old Kindle is dying so ordered this one.  It is just incredible so far.  Very easy to set up and use.  The graphics are beautiful and the sound amazing!  I'm not too fond of the cover I ordered because it doesn't hold the stylus - bet that stylus will be lost in a day..lol

Reviews.Title: Mobile movie theatre .
Reviews.Author: alirich
Reviews.Content: The screen is sharper than my hdmi tv .The speaker sound is incredible for its size.I can watch movies and read anywhere and not bother anyone (when using head phones.)The 7 inch fire HDX is so light I can hold it like a book .Excellent wifi reception.Easy to use.I do admit that I watch most on netflix because cheaper and better selection.

Reviews.Title: Crashed constantly. I have lost all hope in Amazon hardware.
Reviews.Author: Sebastian "speelbergo"
Reviews.Content: I still have a Kindle Fire 1st Gen and have used it heavily for two years. I gave it one star because of the charging problems that Amazon wouldn't fix. Besides that and the occasional crash, I have gotten along with my old kindle pretty well since 2011.With the huge number of improvements that come with the Introduction of the HDX I decided to give Amazon tablets another chance.I returned it after one week's use.There were many very nice improvements to both hardware and software, but i'm not going to detail them because the fatal flaws completely overshadowed anything good I can possibly say about it.My Kindle HDX froze 3 times in two days. And when I say froze, i mean it became completely non-responsive for over an hour until i finally gave up and performed a hard reboot. All 3 times I was using the music player, which should be the easiest, most straightforward operation! I hate to part ways with Amazon because their hardware is so inexpensive but I guess you get what you pay for. I got my wife a two year-old USED iPad, and it has worked flawlessly for a year in our possession, never freezing or requiring a hard reboot.

Reviews.Title: Its a gig monster.
Reviews.Author: Chantell Harris
Reviews.Content: Seems to absorb a large amount of data due to programs running in the background. I had to delete my jetpack info from the system since it ate up 12gigs of data while in sleep mode.

Reviews.Title: Great picture
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Love my Kindle Fire HDX.  I kinda wish I bought the bigger one but i still love it.  I love that I can borrow a book.

Reviews.Title: An excellent device!
Reviews.Author: Al Carpenter
Reviews.Content: Purchased this to replace an earlier model Kindle Reader for my wife and, already, she loves it!  Bigger screen and easier to use than her smart phone, yet perfect size for her purse and, of course, much more sophisticated than the black and white reader.

Reviews.Title: love it so far
Reviews.Author: L. Hayes
Reviews.Content: I only got this today. The color is amazing!I did download some puff files I cannot find on the Adobe app but their in here somewhere. I'm sure I'll figure it out.Mobile files downloaded great. My books were on I n seconds that I'll had on a kindle app. It's not too heavy not extremely light either. Nice size as I have a tablet and a nook tablet. I like the size of this a lot better and the screen.It's just so bright and vivid. I really haven't used  it for anything else yet but I bet games are amazing.I definitely recommend. I have a HD tablet and this HDX blows the color away. Usage is easy and starts up easily not a lot of work.out of the box which I always dread.  Battery seems to hold well. I've been reading for about 4  hrs and it's half drained. If your considering buying just do it you won't regret it.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 7" HDX 16GB
Reviews.Author: Lathanette Creasman
Reviews.Content: Ok I am not a techy person but like to keep up with what the new gadgets are. I never buy technical toys as I call them. Family has been trying to get me to get one of these for over a year. Well, I LOVE IT!!!! I got it because I am in a bookclub and everyone uses theirs to for their books and other avenues. I am still a paperbook fan but I love the Kindle Fire HDX. Best investment I have done since a laptop.

Reviews.Title: Bright and Light
Reviews.Author: John
Reviews.Content: The screen is truly fantastic but the first thing I noticed was how light the device was. It blows my mind how they can pack such technology in such a small package. I am very happy with this purchase and highly recommend it to anyone.

Reviews.Title: My favorite Kindle
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: I love my newest Kindle.  This is very fast, very user friendly. I recently lost my laptop, but since I have been using this tablet, I won't replace the laptop.  I have a desktop computer when I want a keyboard, or a big screen for movies.  But, this tablet is fantastic for everything else, all the time, any time.  I check email, watch movies, read books, listen to music. LOVE IT!  I took it to school and let my 5th graders take turns using it for independent reading time.  It made reading so much fun for them. I also used a timer app in class as well.  The battery life is good on this tablet.  I use my other kindles, but this is my favorite one.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Oceansky
Reviews.Content: So far I am loving my Kidle Fire HDX.  It is fast on its downloads and I'm still playing with it to get to know all it's features.

Reviews.Title: my thoughts
Reviews.Author: lloyd l bolson
Reviews.Content: device seems to work fine.  I would have given it 5 stars if it had instructions.  Being new to amazon/android platform, I am still trying to get to work in a consistent fashion.

Reviews.Title: Great device!!
Reviews.Author: Melinda Roslin
Reviews.Content: This device is totally plug n play.  Easy to use, navigation is intuitive and it's large enough to read and play games, but small enough to put in my handbag.  I'm reading books again on a regular basis because of this device.  I love it!

Reviews.Title: great kindle hdx
Reviews.Author: Bill Fox
Reviews.Content: I love this thing. The display is awesome and its very fast with a nice processor. Reccomend it to anyone looking for a great tablet for gaming.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful tablet
Reviews.Author: catlib55
Reviews.Content: I love this tablet. I am a prime member, and getting videos through prime on this is seamless and fast. I also play a few games which are fun to do. And what I use it for mostly is reading, and getting books through the Amazon store is simple and quick. Also, it came the day after I ordered it, which was a really nice surprise. I expected it in two days, but it came in one day. Way to go, Amazon!!

Reviews.Title: Great value
Reviews.Author: Joseph Burns
Reviews.Content: The Kindle HDX is a solid tablet. You get the greatest bang for your buck with this little thing. I dont really care for owning a tablet but it sure is great having one around.

Reviews.Title: Mother, welome to the 21'st century...
Reviews.Author: Kevin Miller
Reviews.Content: Ok, fist let me start off by saying job well done Amazon on the Kindle Fire HDX. I bought this item to bring my 70 year old mother into the 21'st century because it has the mayday button. I don't live in the same state as my mother so helping her with technology via the phone I knew would be daunting and the mayday button was the best solution. I had the item mailed to me so I could set it up for her and absolutely fell in love with it. I have a Microsoft Surface Pro which is great for doing college work, or other computer related things. The Surface too can also double as a tablet (but because of the weight) not for long period of time. The HDX was so light, the resolution was fabulous for watching movies and to my dismay, the sound was better than on my Surface Pro!! Amazon, if your intention was to help those whom would not otherwise get connected... You hit the nail on the head with this product. *****APPLAUSE******

Reviews.Title: My first tablet and I love it!
Reviews.Author: Mekare
Reviews.Content: First of all, I must say that this is my first tablet.  After reading reviews and doing product comparing on tablets, I decided on a Kindle Fire HDX.First impressions:I loved the look and feel but since this was my first tablet, I wish Amazon would of included more information and instructions.  It took me a few minutes just to unlock the screen.The plugin came with an adapter and I was thrilled because I didn't want to have to use my computer to charge.  The angled way that the cord goes in is a nice feature but made me uneasy the first time I inserted the power cord.Setup was very easy once I remembered all my login and password information.Charging time was about 6 hours which isn't too bad but I was quite impatient waiting.The first app that I downloaded was Candy Crush.  That process was easy and only took a few minutes.After a month of use...I love it.  The picture quality is excellent.  The sound quality is better than you'd expect.  I play a few games, browse Facebook, Twitter and Pinterest with ease.  You'd think you were on a computer with as fast as things load.  I've watched a few things and was really surprised by how good it looked.  I've also visited websites that aren't "made for mobile" and was thrilled that they work perfectly.Although I love my HDX there's a few things that I wish were better, improved, etc....Battery life.  I mainly just play a few games and browse a few places but the battery seems to drain kind of fast.  Just doing a few simple things each evening and I have to charge it every other day.  I couldn't imagine how often it would need to charge if I used it throughout the day.Availability of apps.  There's so many apps and games that are only available for Apple and Google so I wish there was more compatibility with Amazon and the Kindle Fire.Ability to watch YouTube videos without an app would be nice.Ability to play Java or Adobe Flash games or videos would be wonderful.Some questions...Care and maintenance.  What's the best way to ensure overall battery life?  Should I let the battery drain completely sometimes?  I have a case.  Do I need a screen protector?  What's the best way to clean the screen?With winter now here, how does the HDX do in cool or cold weather?  Should I keep it at a certain temperature for use or let it warm up before using?  What about summer heat?Like with computers do I need to clear the cache sometimes?  How do I maintain it?  Is there maintenance like on computers that should be done?  Are Kindle Fires at risk for trojans, virus', malware, adware, etc?  Is there a firewall?  What can I do to protect my HDX?Overall, I am VERY happy with my HDX and I'm glad I chose it.  I would recommend it to anyone that was wanting a tablet.  There's many things it can do and it is good for almost anything and anyone.  Amazon Prime is a great add-on and the benefits are well worth the cost.

Reviews.Title: Perfect Tablet
Reviews.Author: Vickie Stinnett
Reviews.Content: I have had my Kindle Fire HDX 7" for about 5 days and I LOVE it.  I have an iPad but I like this much better and the price is right.  I have been watching movies, TV shows, and I am really enjoying Amazon's Alpha House.  One of the best purchases I have made in a long time. I just may just sell my iPad.  If you are on the fence on this come on down, you won't be disappointed.

Reviews.Title: love it!!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "aunt carol of 4"
Reviews.Content: I had one of the original Kindle Fires - which I love & still have.  I just wanted to upgrade to the newest available Kindle Fire. I've had it about a week now & it is even better than I hoped for.  I can now keep my laptop in the office b/c the web capabilities are so much better.

Reviews.Title: Great Tablet.
Reviews.Author: paigewild
Reviews.Content: Great tablet its just as good if not better than the Nexus Tablet. I Luv it..... This tablet is a must buy......

Reviews.Title: Should have got the 64GB
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "Milo"
Reviews.Content: I upgraded from the original 8GB fire to the the HDX with 32GB and my only regret is not getting the 64GB.  I mostly use the Fire for reading, audiobooks, and podcasts.Negatives: No SD card reader.  No pre-installed podcasting app.Positives:  Nice hardware specs.  Fast, thin, and sharp.

Reviews.Title: Just got mine today
Reviews.Author: Ryan Kohlhaas
Reviews.Content: I bought this for a gift this Christmas. I bought it on the first day of Cyber Monday when it was 50$ off and honestly if you know how good the HDX is as a tablet in itself...it is totally worth it.I was alittle scared when I received my package today because it looked squashed. Amazon can't help the parcels journey but they put the Kindle in a tiny box with no protection like  bubble wrap etc. I turned it on to make sure everything worked and it is fantastic. The processor is super fast ( Better version of the new Nexus' 7), the screen is beautiful ( better than the iPad Air ) and it is barely 11 oz. in weight.I read alot of negative reviews about a "defect" with the lighting on the screen. If you do your research, the Kindle uses blue LEDs instead of white. The blue backlight in the device allows less power consumption and it provides the screen with a vibrant crisp image.The bottom line is, If you are getting a tablet as a gift this season, right now at this price, it doesn't get any better. The Kindle Fire HDX is a tablet that is proving to out do Apple and Google. If you are tech savy you can side load Google Apps or even root the device now. Anyone who says otherwise is delusional

Reviews.Title: Kindle HDX is OKX!
Reviews.Author: Robb Sinert
Reviews.Content: Wow. More than I expected. Faster than my desktop. Learning all the swipe techniques and enjoying it so far. One week owner.

Reviews.Title: SWEET
Reviews.Author: KBroadhead
Reviews.Content: This was a purchase for my daughter. Not only did it arrive quickly (thanks to Prime), it was easy to setup and get her books downloaded.

Reviews.Title: Nice addition
Reviews.Author: Harrison
Reviews.Content: This was an early Christmas present and I'm happy I bought it.  It's used every day and performs well.  The screen and sound are amazing.  Tons of apps.  Just wish there were some other features like the ability to change wallpapers or have access to the Google Play store. There are apps that I've purchased on the Play store that I would have to repurchase if I want them on the Kindle even though they are the same app. The Mayday feature is nice to have, I've used it once and saved me from doing the research.  Nice addition that I didn't think I would use as much as I do.

Reviews.Title: Sweetheart loves it!
Reviews.Author: Daniel Lavan
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my sweetheart and she now can get many hours of enjoyment from it!She loves it and all she can do with it!

Reviews.Title: Nice, but does not hold a charge long enough
Reviews.Author: Happylark
Reviews.Content: I have enjoyed owning the new Kindle Fire for its speed and beautiful display.  My only issue is that it does not hold a charge for long, even in sleep mode.  I have found that in sleep mode, the new Fire HDX can quickly drain the battery.  Amazon should review this problem a fix it for the next version.

Reviews.Title: Amazing graphics
Reviews.Author: Sibeez "Sibeez"
Reviews.Content: I use my Kindle for web surfing, reading, watching an occasional movie.  The graphics are amazing.  Connection time dramatically improved over my other Kindle.  Can't speak for anyone using it as a business tool but for home use and entertainment, I love it.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Jimmy Bob "Jimmy"
Reviews.Content: Amazing tablet. The screen is beautiful, super high resolution, like a 7inch retina iphone, with perfect color. The processor is fast. I can load webpages as fast as my laptop - never have been able to do that on a tablet before. The speakers produce the best sound I've heard from any portable device, including laptops. The tablet responds to touch the way an apple product would. Amazon has hit a home run with this one.

Reviews.Title: battery doesn't last
Reviews.Author: Pink "Pink LA"
Reviews.Content: Great item. Looks great and the image is fantastic.  Battery only last for two to three  hours. I don't like just front camera ure feature..rather, I prefer rear camera.

Reviews.Title: MUCH better than the previous Kindle Fire!
Reviews.Author: CLFnyc "charlenenyc"
Reviews.Content: I really like the Kindle Fire.  I  bought one about a year ago and returned it because I felt it was too klunky.  I preferred the regular kindle with the light. I decided to try it again based on a review I got from my colleague. Loving it!

Reviews.Title: Super!
Reviews.Author: Mary Beth Knapp
Reviews.Content: I am really enjoying my new Kindle Fire HDX 7. The internet is quick and the screen very responsive to the touch.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Denise Reeder
Reviews.Content: Exactly what I wanted. I love that I don't have to have a reading light to go with it, like I had to with my first kindle.

Reviews.Title: Better than fire.  A caveman might disagree.
Reviews.Author: Christian Burnett
Reviews.Content: Got this for my girlfriend as a birthday present to replace her Kindle Fire HD.  She loves the lighter weight, brighter, clearer screen, and speed.

Reviews.Title: Great small tablet but wish it had a back facing camera
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I love the Kindle Fire HDX 7".  It fits into my purse and does everything I need to do on the fly.  My calendar, contacts for email, books to read and a game to play if I want to.  The only thing lacking is a back facing camera.  I would love to take pictures when the occasion presents itself.  The front facing camera is great for Skype but I don't do that very often.  Maybe in the future Amazon may consider upgrading the Fire HDX with both a front and back facing camera.

Reviews.Title: It was a choice of Nexus 7 vs. Fire HDX ... I made the right choice
Reviews.Author: James C. Westland
Reviews.Content: It was a choice of Nexus 7 vs. Fire HDX ... I bought the Fire and made the right choice.  I've had this for a day now and am impressed by:1.Clarity and richness of the screen.  This is a perfectly good book reader; easy on the eyes2.Speed of processor, network access...it's very noticable (I have a Cisco E2500 router which takes advantage of MIMO and dual band)3.User Interface (users seem to prefer the native Android of the Nexus, but I actually like Kindle's simplicity)4.The Silk Browser does seem to be faster (x2-x3) than browsers on my Mac Air, or 4th Gen iPad5.Amazon's Prime video, etc. content ... I would download these anyway from another tablet, so why not AmazonThe biggest gripe of other reviewers seems to be Amazon's aggressive advertising and link to their ecosystem.  I have the special offers (cheaper) version, and don't really find the ads annoying (if I did $20 would fix that).  And I like the direct link to Amazon's content.  Nor does Amazon try to prevent you from sideloading APKs (they actually give you an installer on the device) nor from rooting (you can relatively easily install CyanogenMod I've heard).  In truth, I think rooting would be a big mistake, as you would lose out on Amazon's ecosystem without gaining anything.  The better route is to sideload the Nova Launcher (or there are several other launchers that do just as well) as they more or less remove any advertising, and give you a more conventional Android interface.  I make sure that I have links on the Nova Launcer dock to Amazon store and to Silk.  It's the best of both worlds.Update...I've had my HDX for two weeks now, and am pleased that Amazon has such a light hand in controlling their UI.  I've loaded the Nova Launcher on my HDX, with docked icons for Kindle Store, and Silk Browser.  The result is a better UI than IOS or Nexus 7.  Almost everything I want is sideloadable.  I tried sideloading GooglePlay (*HaHa*) but that didn't work for a fairly obvious reason -- Amazon did not want to be responsible for an App that collects payments outside their own ecosystem (it opens up a host of headaches for them).I purchased the NETGEAR Push2TV Wireless Display HDMI Adapter - Miracast and WiDi (PTV3000) and after a bit of fiddling (I had to load the latest update to get the HDX to mirror) had it working.  For those who don't know, this essentially provides the sort of display mirroring on a TV that you get with Apple TV and the iPad, but without the content limitations.  It works flawlessly, and I have been using this more than my Roku3 to watch movies, YouTube, etc.  The X-ray feature on Amazon Videos is nice (essentially access to IMDB database while watching a movie) works well, and is actually quite useful.I even used the Mayday button once trying to set up the Netgear Push2TV ... it works as advertised and Amazon staff are great!In my opinion for a variety of reasons which I would classify under the general rubric of Amazon's "ecosystem" the HDX is better than Nexus 7 and iPad Mini-Retina (which is ridiculously overpriced), which makes it the best 7" tablet available.Oh... and be sure to buy the Amazon Kindle Fire HD Standing Polyurethane Origami Case (will only fit All New Kindle Fire HD 7"), Mineral Black ... this is (if you  look at product reviews) an unloved and misunderstood accessory.  I was not impressed when I first got it, but now that I own it, I think it is the best case out there (though too expensive in my opinion).  The stand and magnetic cover work as advertised.  The tray that the Kindle sits in is magnetic and holds the HDX well, but allows it easily to be removed and reinserted.

Reviews.Title: Outstanding with a couple of short comings!!!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Great screen, but needs GPS CHIP.  Needs more recent version of Android.  Very good support. Otherwise competes well with Nexus 7.

Reviews.Title: HDX and Cover Eval
Reviews.Author: Marvin M.
Reviews.Content: Not the fault of the tablet but the cover for it is difficult to keep stable on many surfaces...plain ridge cover like the HD would be a nice. option

Reviews.Title: Excited
Reviews.Author: Amanda Vasquez
Reviews.Content: I'm very happy with the Kindle Fire HDX the picture and sound is amazing it did not disappoint what so ever. It's very easy to navigate around it, so you don't get lost.

Reviews.Title: SO NOT Worth It!!!.....Read Follow Up....
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: I have only had this new Fire for a couple of hours, and have only had about 20 minutes to 'play' with it and I am already hooked!!  It is SO worth the upgrade to the HDX!  Love how user friendly it is, love the new email system, love the vibrant colors, love the feature that tracks how quick/slow you read and how much time/pages left to the end of a chapter.  This is just the beginning!  I can't imagine how much greater it probably is!  I can't wait to get the time to play with it more!  Thank you Amazon for another GREAT Kindle!A follow up!!!  Since my original review, I've had to return not only the original, but TWO more!!!  The first two would not hold a charge when in sleep mode.  The third one was charging for NINE hours and only made it up to 58% charged!  To make matters worse it came with no original box, which worried me as to if it was refurbished.  Amazon admitted it was a mistake and I was sent refurbished.  This has been a HUGE frustration dealing with having to call each time, packing them up and then making the 25-30 minute drive one way to our local UPS store!  I have no doubt I will love this device if I ever get one that works the way it is supposed to work!To date I have yet to receive an HDX that will hold a charge.  I am now on the 5th unit.  I cannot keep the internet on or will will drain within a few hours to dead.  In fact just downloading my latest books will drain at least 25% of my power that I had before turning on the internet to download the books.  Out of frustration I have kept this 5th one and just don't turn the internet on.  Now after just a month of using it, the screen keeps flashing like it is going to die/go blank.  This is the WORST problem I've ever had with any electronic device I've had!  Although Amazon is fine with sending replacements over and over there has been no compensation for my aggravation and the 1 hour drive to get it to the nearest USPS store to drop off the duds!VERY unhappy with Amazon at this point and I have lost a lot of faith in their customer service!

Reviews.Title: I love it!
Reviews.Author: Gloria E Shank
Reviews.Content: Love it!  Haven't had much time to apprciate it but love that I can check what email needs attention and light enough to carry w/me where ever I go.  I know that there's more but to busy w/holidays to take advantage.

Reviews.Title: Mayday very helpful, great sound and screen.
Reviews.Author: 12 Paw Ranch
Reviews.Content: I upgraded to this from a Kindle Fire 7" that I bought about a year ago.  The reason I upgraded was to be able to download Prime videos.  The last thing I thought I would use was the Mayday button - I usually am the person that other people come to with electronics questions.  To my surprise, the Mayday button was helpful even for me.  There was a problem with me having too many Kindle devices registered, so my books would not open on the new device.  Even though I could have fixed that myself, contacting Mayday got the job done faster.  I talked with two Mayday operators since buying this new Kindle - both were easy to understand and knowledgeable.The sound and HD screen is very impressive, a big improvement over my Fire from 2012.  The processor is also impressively fast.  I have to say that battery life is not great, but adequate.  I have yet to try using the device with the WiFi off, which likely would improve battery life.  I don't find the special offers to be intrusive - they are only on the unlock screen, and are kind of like a screen saver.  There actually have been times when I have looked into the offers, so for me the extra cost to remove the offers would not be worth it.

Reviews.Title: amazed again
Reviews.Author: ls
Reviews.Content: My first Kindle Fire (1st gen) amazed me two years ago.  I didn't think my new Kindle Fire HDX would be as amazing but I was wrong.  The color is brilliant and the improvements are everything I could imagine.  I was worried that it would be difficult to transfer all my contents to the new one but I was up and running within minutes and everything was transferred with no problem.  I love my new Kindle Fire HDX.  I will be gifting my old Kindle Fire to my 9 year old granddaughter for Christmas and she will be thrilled.  So, in conclusion I could not be happier with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: Great product!! iPad mini rival for sure!!
Reviews.Author: Katia Zahn
Reviews.Content: Great product!! Quad core processor screams along and runs any app perfectly! Better deal than an iPad mini for sure!

Reviews.Title: The value and quality of the 7" Kindle Fire HDX can't be beat
Reviews.Author: carpenocturne
Reviews.Content: In the tablet market, you can't beat the value regarding price on the Kindle Fire HDX. The picture quality is excellent and is perfect for viewing movies, videos and pictures. I do a lot of reading and the screen is perfect for that too. Combine all of this with the vast selections of Amazon.com and you have a near perfect device for all of your portable entertainment needs. There aren't as many app choices as Apple but all the most in demand apps are available and I've already gotten many of them. All apps, videos, music and books open and close very quickly. The only drawback I can see for some people is that you can't change the lock screen picture on your own without rooting your Kindle which I will not do but this isn't important to me. There is a revolving series of programmed pictures on the lock screen which also shows the time, and the home screen is solid black.

Reviews.Title: Disappointing purchase - defective device
Reviews.Author: Venketaram R.
Reviews.Content: The Kindle I received ended up being defective. Unfortunately, downloads of any apps, purchases, etc. never went through and left the placeholders for the apps unable to be closed. Given that I had previously strongly considered purchasing a Kindle, this was a disappointing and frustrating ordeal.However, I give this review an extra star for the excellent help provided to me via MayDay in trying to troubleshoot my device.

Reviews.Title: Great unit but has video issues
Reviews.Author: michael bolte
Reviews.Content: The unit has a great display, camera has great clarity but there is a problem with it when used with Skype the video has about a second delay over the sound.  Also the unit reboot itself about once a day.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire
Reviews.Author: Donna Braxton
Reviews.Content: I love the Kindle Fire! The colors are vibrant and clear, and the programs are user friendly. My granddaughter also enjoys it, and I don't have to worry about what she might get into with the kids programming. My biggest problem is getting it away from her so that I can use it!

Reviews.Title: This is an awesome tablet
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: it is the best tablet around. only draw back is the one camera, hard to take good pics. Get one today

Reviews.Title: Excellent device
Reviews.Author: John Wuk
Reviews.Content: Works flawlessly.  Extremely fast WiFi connection.  Screen is top notch.  Light weight and great size for travel.  Easy to sideload apps.  Waiting for PS 4 to be added so I can try second screen.  Connects so much faster than my laptop find myself using it for most of my browsing.

Reviews.Title: Awesome tablet for the price
Reviews.Author: Melanie
Reviews.Content: This is a very nice tablet for the price and my Grandchildren love it too! Very kid friendly! They are each getting their own for Christmas!

Reviews.Title: I threw my Xyborg out after trying this.
Reviews.Author: Marge90601 "Dog Lover"
Reviews.Content: Fast to connect to wifi, responsive keypad and screen, extra features not available on other wifi tablets, ads not intrusive, haven't even started enjoying all the features. But as soon as I started it up and got on my email, I got rid of my Motorola Xyborg which was very unresponsive, difficult to type on, hard to connect with.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire 7" HDX
Reviews.Author: Marianne Nyberg
Reviews.Content: Love the new kindle HDX.  Clarity is very sharp although still a little hard to read in the sun.  (Maybe too sharp).  Still learning all the functions.  Wish there was a way to down load a full manual, vs sections at a time.Hard to sync pictures from an android phone.Not as easy to find the prime books and movies available, but with the help of the mayday button, you easily learn.Glad I up graded.

Reviews.Title: Another step of improvement
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: This is the third Kindle and second Kindle Fire I have owned.  The HDX is even sharper than the HD is.

Reviews.Title: Great machine, enable Hulu with the Silk browser.
Reviews.Author: lancebenton
Reviews.Content: Great machine.  I bought this and my wife has a Kindle Fire HD.  We also subscribe to Amazon Prime.  My squawk is that the Silk browser does not work with Hulu (previews only) and they want you to subscribe to Hulu plus.  Amazon prime offers lots of great free streaming programs but for Hulu programming I have to go back to my laptop and just use the regular web browser to go to Hulu.com  Maybe enable Hulu if you subscribe to Amazon Prime?  r/LOB

Reviews.Title: Kindle HDX are great
Reviews.Author: Goldfinger
Reviews.Content: love my Kindle, the picture quality is great; however the internet is not the greatest. I did not buy it for the internet so I would have to say I am very pleased with my Kindle.

Reviews.Title: I enjoy the enhancements, with a few exceptions
Reviews.Author: markh
Reviews.Content: I like the display, memory and speed.While reading and charging the usb cable must come out of the top. Add on the origami stand and I can not open it like a book (right to left).Since yesterday's update the device rebooted 2 or 3 times in 10 minutes while reading.This also places the light sensor were my hand swipe hovers causing backlight to dim.The volume does not APPEAR as loud as the fire hd-7.The battery life is definitely 10-20% shorter than the fire hd-7.Looking forward to loading it up with prime videos offline...8D

Reviews.Title: This is great, perfect for the traveler...
Reviews.Author: Bonnie J. Seagroves
Reviews.Content: This is a GREAT tablet!  I had been debating whether to purchase something like this for years.  I am not someone who goes out and buys the latest and greatest- I keep things until they no longer work.  Last year I purchased a Kindle fire for my granddaughter who is 9, and I had the chance to use it a couple of times... This one has better picture and better sound.  It is a basic model- perfect for the person who travels and needs to check email, read, play games, and watch movies/listen to music.  I am in love with this and will keep it until it dies, just like my disc walkman!

Reviews.Title: Fantastic Colors and Great Book Reader and E mail Function
Reviews.Author: dennis
Reviews.Content: I purchased for my wife, who at 69, is not a wiz and computers, no matter how long I teach her how to use it.  She did learn to sort of master the Kindle keyboard...(how hard is it to push a button to turn a page?), but could never learn how to remove the books she read from the reader (backspace)!But, she loves her new Kindle fire: the color, the finger motions, all seem to make intuitive sense to her, so the calls for help are few and far between.  The next step is for her do e mail on it and considering the issues she has had with both lap top and smaller pc; we will see.  I tried it and it is very simple and works well.  She is a single finger type artist, so the lack of physical keyboard will not be an issue.She is primarily a book reader and she loves seeing the book cover!

Reviews.Title: It's great! Fast!
Reviews.Author: C.M.
Reviews.Content: I bought this for myself as a B-Day gift and Love it! The only reason it received 4 stars is due to a kinda shorter battery life. (That is because an I pad charge lasts forever).

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 7"
Reviews.Author: Phyllis Osback
Reviews.Content: I LOVE everything about it; except, the screen is very sensitive. Also, It turns and then I have to move it a lot to get it back to the way I want it.  I LOVE, LOVE, LOVE "May Day".  I originally purchased the new Nexus 7 2013 and was not happy with it at all.  I returned it and purchased the Kindle Fire HDX 7".

Reviews.Title: Great tablet for price
Reviews.Author: Richfella
Reviews.Content: I am happy with my purchase.  As someone who reads a lot of pdfs, the pdfs viewer, so far, has been flawless.  I loaded several textbooks to the cloud and read them with the doc viewer with no problems.  I will say that the feature that offers to finish your words is annoying at times, but adding words to the dictionary has improved its recognition of the jargon I use in my work.  Silk has crashed a few times, but it may be do to poorly designed websites with pop ups.  Otherwise, I have been pleased with the Kindle HDX and would recommend buying one.  I also watched Sharknado on it.  I didn't mind the small screen.

Reviews.Title: Very good upgrades for Fire
Reviews.Author: Robert Lombardo
Reviews.Content: Big improvement from the original Fire excel ant sound quick response great color,very comfortable watching movies.I quite enjoy listening to my music on cloud every night

Reviews.Title: New kindle
Reviews.Author: Frank Latchford
Reviews.Content: Very nice and love it! This kindle is nicer than my old one! Much clearer especially for when I am playing my games!

Reviews.Title: Great Kindle!
Reviews.Author: Sharon Mcclellan "Garden Nana"
Reviews.Content: I really like this Kindle Fire HDX.  Great for travel.  I can access my accounts, read a book, enjoy Facebook and much, much more while traveling.  Much better than lugging around a big laptop.

Reviews.Title: Like it
Reviews.Author: Robert B. Miller
Reviews.Content: This unit is more powerful than my original Fire. I can surf the web more easily, and playing videos and music is a dream.

Reviews.Title: Apps
Reviews.Author: Joseph J DeLeone
Reviews.Content: I really like Kindle.  Some of the apps that I like have not worked. I am still learning how to utilize all it has to offer.

Reviews.Title: Like the Product But Concerned About Quality of Hardware (had to get a replacement after a week of use)
Reviews.Author: Scott Gill
Reviews.Content: I've had my Kindle HDX for about a week now, and I had to call and get a replacement today. The Kindle won't charge. It will turn on as long as it's plugged into a power source, but as soon as I unplug the device, it shuts down due to low battery. They are sending me a replacement that should be here in a couple of days, but it leaves me to question the quality of the hardware on the new Kindle, in general. I wonder what will happen six months or a year down the road with my replacement.That said, I love the product for the week that I was able to use it. Love the interface, the picture quality, and the look and feel of the device. There are a few apps that I have on my Android phone that aren't available in the Kindle App store (like ESPN Fantasy Football), but I'm sure that more apps will be added over time.In conclusion: I like the product, but I'm concerned about the quality of the device hardware.

Reviews.Title: Very good buy
Reviews.Author: goal13keep
Reviews.Content: This is a great buy for the money. Much much faster than the original Kindle Fire. It's a great size and weight, and an excellent price. Overall I'm very happy with the way it functions. My only complaint is that the app store seems to be lacking some. I haven't been able to get some of the apps that I use on my other devices. The ads that show up on the lock screen are a bit annoying, but not overtly bothersome (as soon as you unlock to get to your main screen, the ads are gone).I would recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: Nice tablet - fast and high picture quality
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "shaoli"
Reviews.Content: Kindle fire hdx is a very good device. I like its wifi speed. It is faster than my iPad mini. The iPad mini paused a lot when I use it in my kitchen; the kindle fire hdx does not. Also picture quality of the kindle device is much better. It has a fluid key board too. Typing on screen is smooth and effortless. (Foreign language key board input is easy to set up.) I install apps by just searching on the internet with silk browser and install the android tablet comparable version. Of course you can go to the App Store to install apps if there are any. I have both App Store found apps and internet found apps installed. It is just like a powerful mini PC. One thing I would like to mention is that I do not see the blue edge issue at all. When I use my apps, the picture quality is superb. No distraction what so ever.

Reviews.Title: Great to have this gadget
Reviews.Author: Aldrich Farrel Saputra
Reviews.Content: Really love this kindle version, high end spec with a reasonable price. Technically speaking this was a good deal for me, the sound, the display, the reading experience is superb. even though i feel a bit frustrated with the region restriction.

Reviews.Title: laughing at auto correct!
Reviews.Author: a.seas
Reviews.Content: Love my new HDX7, camera ready,lots of fun,love the tech support , have used it  twice now! Both times the service was excellent,  And the price is great, for the HDX 7 , auto correct can get a bit annoying, but you do get good laughs from it.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Angie
Reviews.Content: So far it is great. It's a lot better on the battery life also. I like the slim design and it seems to move a lot better

Reviews.Title: Great Screen Detail
Reviews.Author: D.J.B. "water man"
Reviews.Content: A pleasant improvement from the 7" Kindle HD that I sold to my brother. This 7" HDX model has a more detailed screen that makes the smaller sized screen more useful for web searches and emails.

Reviews.Title: I CAN GET TO THINGS WITHIN 1SEC
Reviews.Author: Julie
Reviews.Content: Best thing ever bigger than the iPod smaller than the iPad perfect size for my hands I can get to things within 1 sec

Reviews.Title: New Kindle Fire HDX
Reviews.Author: coulter
Reviews.Content: I have the original Kindle fire which I love but this one ....wow!!!!!  It powers up fast and I like that it will go to sleep but wakes up fast.  It move from screen to screen with the greatest of ease.  It is not hard to get around.  I just love it more!!!!!!  Sorry original kindle, but remember you were my first.  :)

Reviews.Title: my new favorite toy
Reviews.Author: AMBERISAAC55
Reviews.Content: It's wonderful haven't had any problems at all. Packaging was wonderful, was very nice and just opening my new toy was so exciteing like being a child on Christmas. I love it so much great quality but my only wish is that I wish it had the camera on the back but that's the only thing I don't like

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT
Reviews.Author: Jeannette
Reviews.Content: I love my Kindle Fire HDX. I can't really complain about it. It's a great tablet for the price you pay.

Reviews.Title: I love my Kindle Fire!
Reviews.Author: Sami B
Reviews.Content: I love my Kindle and I use it every day. I love cloud for all of my pictures. I love to be able to go from facebook or pinterest to reading my books, to playing games all in one sitting. Best toy I have. ;-)

Reviews.Title: great !!!
Reviews.Author: MIGUEL ANGEL CALLAN
Reviews.Content: Simply greatMy first kindle and I have had no problems. I recommend it strongly. No regrets at all pals

Reviews.Title: E$asy to set-up
Reviews.Author: S. TANNENBAUM
Reviews.Content: Easy to set-up and use for a novice.  Tried Android based unit & after 5 hours gave up.  This I had set-up & running within 15 minutes.

Reviews.Title: Hard to beat the price to feature ratio with this Kindle Fire HDX
Reviews.Author: KAYCEE
Reviews.Content: From its design to display to speed and functionality, Kindle Fire HDX is a very good tablet. Crystal clear HD display with the fastest processor in a tablet make it an attractive buy. A rear camera would have been superb along with a robust app library like the Google Play store. Also support for Google apps would't hurt. Great HD experience with Amazon Prime and Netflix. VUDU and other video apps need "sideloading" at the moment. Reading experience is amazing. Makes up for a great holiday gift this year.

Reviews.Title: Perfect travel companion
Reviews.Author: Jeff Fraley
Reviews.Content: I travel frequently and my wife got this for me before my last long trip.  Excellent choice for reading books and watching HD movies.

Reviews.Title: great !!!
Reviews.Author: MIGUEL ANGEL CALLAN

Reviews.Title: Perfect travel companion
Reviews.Author: Jeff Fraley
Reviews.Content: I travel frequently and my wife got this for me before my last long trip.  Excellent choice for reading books and watching HD movies.

Reviews.Title: Love this Kindle
Reviews.Author: Inga
Reviews.Content: It took me a long time to make the decision to buy a Kindle and now I am so happy that I did.  I can buy books and have them immediately and can easily take my "books" with me to read anywhere.  The lighted screen is wonderful as is the size. I looked at the Kindle Fire but this model is so much more user friendly.

Reviews.Title: kindle
Reviews.Author: Zach Braniger
Reviews.Content: I love the kindle fire hdx it has a great speakers and display is awesome I hpoe other rate 5

Reviews.Title: Glad I had to wait to buy a Kindle
Reviews.Author: C. Aronson
Reviews.Content: I was going to buy a Kindle a few years back, but instead, due to finances, went with an inexpensive tablet. I am now the proud and happy owner of the Kindle Fire HDX 7" 32 GB and loving it! I love the speed with which the pages load, and the clarity of the pages is unreal! I love reading and the pages are so easy to see in any light...regular room light, dark room, and outside. Playing games that I had previously played on my old tablet is a whole new experience. The games are more vibrant, and no hesitation.I haven't used the Kindle for music yet, but based on what other have said, I am sure it will be great.I do like that they are now including the rapid charger with the Kindle, rather than having to purchase one separately. I have not had the need to use the "Mayday" button yet, but it is nice to know that it is there when I need it.I have not had this Kindle too long, but I can't find anything I don't like. Should that change, I will update this review. I also want to add that I am a Senior Citizen and want to let other Seniors know that they should not be afraid to buy a Kindle...it is so easy to set up (open box, register) and use!While I was having regrets about not buying a Kindle the first time, I am glad I had to wait because I now have one that has been improved and that I expect to have for some time.

Reviews.Title: The new Fire HDX 32 GB is AWESOME
Reviews.Author: Sara Rice
Reviews.Content: Another great Amazon Kindle Fire. Super easy to set it up.  Open the box and turn it on.  Register it and you are good to go!I purchased this as a gift and my daughter loves her new Fire HDX.  It is smaller and lighter than her previous Fire and wow it does a great job.  My daughter uses it to listen to music and read books.  It also has a great browser so it's super fast for her to search the web.  I really like how she can also watch her favorite shows and movies and with Prime it's so worth it.There are plenty of Apps and I am really impressed how fast it is.  I would consider it as a really nice tablet and for the price, you really can't beat it.

Reviews.Title: A great tablet
Reviews.Author: Sally in Colorado
Reviews.Content: This kindle fire tablet is finally really a tablet.  I love it for reading, doing email and running apps.  I am an app developer and I am have written an app for iPad, and android. So I have tried them all.  I own Samsung Tab 3, Nexus 7, 2 iPads and a kindle (1st gen). So I am very familiar with all these tablets.  I would have given it 5 stars, but the apps on iPad are better and more of them. It could also use a back camera to be competitive but I never use that anyway.  For the price, Amazon has done an excellent job on this device.  I even used the "May day" service a few times when I got it.Later:  I am finding the battery usage frustrating.  The battery doesn't last as long as my laptop.  It runs done faster than any other tablet that I own (iPad, Samsung Tab 3, Nexus 7). So I am down grading my rating.

Reviews.Title: Excellent!!
Reviews.Author: Diane
Reviews.Content: First tablet ever and I LOVE IT!! Has everything I need and more!So glad I purchased it and the price was the best! I've waited for this and couldn't be happier!

Reviews.Title: Blue haze is very distracting
Reviews.Author: RandomReader
Reviews.Content: Please be aware of the blue haze on the border of the screen.  According to Amazon the haze is an unavoidable side effect of the screen architecture, meaning it can't be fixed.  If you use any app with a white background (books, web, etc) this will become an unacceptable distraction.Other than that the device is great. One fatal flaw, however, still spells doom.

Reviews.Title: Overall: Below Expectations
Reviews.Author: CD
Reviews.Content: Admittedly, I purchased this because of price. As my first pseudo-Android tablet, I found it to be a very limited tablet based on Apps available and limitations on installing true Android apps, including a real internet browser.Battery life for active use seems to be as-advertised; however I do not expect the batteries to fully drain while in sleep mode - this is the case with my unit.Screen quality is superb for a 7" tablet - the blue-haze issue on the borders is somewhat annoying when reading books.  Sound quality is second to none when compared to my other tablets.  Mayday is a cool feature - in a couple of instances I received great support and help; in others, it was anything but helpful.I am not a Prime subscriber - even that has limitations over other alternative media providers. This further convinced me not to subscribe.Overall, my disappointment stems from the limitation enforced with the Android apps available (c'mon, no YouTube or real Browser?), the questionable battery life when not in use, and the blue haze of this otherwise great display.Finally, I saw a recent TV ad comparing the HDX to an iPad... If anything, that ad is pushing me AWAY from any future Kindle purchases - you truly get what you pay for.

Reviews.Title: love it.
Reviews.Author: justin
Reviews.Content: My family and I.own an iPad air, three kindles, several iPhones... you get the point.  For the money, this is far and away the one I consider the best.  Other tablets have their points, but this little guy does everything I can throw at it and more.  Unless you plan on dropping a ton of cash, the fire HDX can't be beat.Only issue I've had with it is I wish the kindle app.store was as extensive as their competitors.

Reviews.Title: Great technology, poor marketing
Reviews.Author: Victoria Hudson
Reviews.Content: The device worked right out of the box. Screen quality is stunning and video amazing. With the origami case there is some heft to the device and over time a unsupported hand holding it would tire. The origami case is a creative solution that works fairly well as a functional case btw. The help capability to instantly video chat with a tech is a positive experience. My Kindle arrived with special offers enabled, though I'd ordered without them. An email to customer support resulted in a reply within a couple hours, on Christmas Eve no less, with the sponsored ads removed, no charge. Incidentally, I think it would be useful if there was a way to opt back in for that content in order to receive the special offers in an unobtrusive manner. If this was controllable by the user that might be useful.I rate the poor marketing due to the following information in the product description: "Stay productive on the go with ultra-fast web browsing, built-in OfficeSuite, and updated e-mail and calendar support for Gmail, Outlook, and more"There is no built-in OfficeSuite. There is a built-in VIEWER.  A viewer is a very different product from an office suite. One can read documents but not be very productive if unable to produce documents, spreadsheets or presentations. This in my mind is just false and misleading advertising. A deciding factor in purchasing this product was the presence of a built-in office suite tool. You won't even know this either, unless you go looking on the product forum, as I and others have done, posting "where is the built-in OfficeSuite? That should tell Amazon something - consumers are expecting a true suite of office tools. Either include one or more accurately portray what is on board.I chose this device after one too many crashes with my first gen iPad. So far, I'm happy with the technology. It's intuitive, easy to use and the images on the screen are exceedingly clear and sharp. Set-up was easy and fast. The very simple on board customer service is in strong contrast to getting help from Apple, which is no where near as easy. That's a definite positive factor for this product. I do not however like a leading advertised facet of the product to turn out as misleading particularly when that facet is what helped me decide to give this alternative technology a try.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: GCP
Reviews.Content: Bought this as a christsmas gift.  So far we love it!  Was very easy to set up and start using immediatly.

Reviews.Title: Sweet!!!
Reviews.Author: Tim Whippo
Reviews.Content: I upgraded from the original Kindle Fire.Compared to the original Kindle Fire, the HDX 7" is noticeably lighter and easier to hold.The quad core processor is very, very fastHDX display is awesome!!

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire 7" HDX problems
Reviews.Author: June Wiatroski
Reviews.Content: I received my kindle HDX on 12/11/13. I have called 4 times with freezing problems.  lcons that were deleted still appeared on home screen .  I spoke to  tech who was hard to understand. After close to an hour,  I requested to talk to a manager. I had to go back to factory default. For a new Kindle  I should not have to do this and freezing problems should not be happening.If this continues I want a new Kindle 7" HDX.review written 12/22/13

Reviews.Title: Perfect tablet except for google integration
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: This tablet is the best 7" tablet available.  Its lighter and the battery lasts longer than the new nexus 7 and I personally think the screen has better color reproduction and contrast.  I had both and compared side by side, the Kindle was just all around better.  HOWEVER, no access to google voice, hangouts, maps, Music, keep, gmail, docs, google calendar, and chrome makes this tablet limited in its awesomeness.  I use a laptop for most of my internet and "productivity" related tasks so no integration with the google ecosystem isn't a deal breaker for me.  But it sure would be nice to be able to have hangouts, keep, maps, and voice.  Almost 100% of my IMing happens in hangouts or facebook chat, neither of which are in the Amazon market, and I would love to check my texts with google voice on the tablet.  No gmail, chrome, docs, or calendar isn't a big deal because the substitutes they have are good enough, and no music is understandable because Amazon has their own music app BUT for light social applications and looking at Maps I really wish amazon would make a deal with Google or create  decent native apps that integrates with them.With that being said, I still like the HDX 7" better than the nexus 7 tablet because of the seamless integration with the amazon ecosystem and amazing access to content through prime. Its so easy to watch movies, play games, read comics, and read books that what little leisure time I have is spent within the amazon ecosystem.  Movie/television integration is easier and more convenient than netflix on android and books look as good as they can on a tablet.  Great product!

Reviews.Title: I recommend this highly to everyone for every need and want :)
Reviews.Author: Debbie "Let your smile change the world, not ...
Reviews.Content: I teach computers and tech to people with different needs and I haven't found anyone that this isn't the perfect answer :)  So far I have 4 clients and 3 family members I have "convinced" to get one.  I only wish I had one too :)  My turn will come soon I know it will :)  Maybe Amazon will give me a credit for all the Fires I help sell and I will buy one with that :)  So just incase let them know my review helped you decide :)  I am kidding :)  only about the credit.  I am very serious about how wonderful the Fire is and how useful it is for just about everything and everyone :)  Please ask questions before buying to make sure because you want to be so happy when the box arrives that it makes you so excited for at least a month or two :) :) :)

Reviews.Title: Totally recommend!
Reviews.Author: wcfbrat
Reviews.Content: I had the first generation kindle and loved it.  I chose this new kindle because of its weight and battery life expectancy and I have not been disappointed.  The visual display is so clear and the criticism of the blue tinge on the outskirts of the display screen is not noticeable and does not take away the reading pleasure.  Overall, I am totally satisfied with this product and highly recommend it.
